AgamagaLalilx tAMtirxka pUjAkarxmavu nirUpitavAgide. pUjA viSayadalilx sitxrXVyarige
matutx puruSarige samAna adhikAravidadxrU sheYva\-bArxhamxNa paraMpareyaMte sitxrXVyarige
veVdAdhikAravilalxveMdu Agama\-gaLu heVLive. I daqSiTxyiMda viVrasheYvadalilx
tAMtirxka pUjAkarxmavu elalxra (sitxrXV-puruSa) swkayaRkAkxgi ide. \hbox{AgamoVkatx}
shivapUjA maMtarxgaLalilx oMdu visheVSavide. iSaTx\-liMgAdi pUjegaLalilx upayoVgisuva
bahaLaSuTx maMtarxgaLa athaR\-gaLu gaMdhadhAraNe modalAda upacAragaLige saMbaMdhisuvudilalx. keVvala
gaMdha muMtAda shabadxparxyoVgadiMda AyA saMbaMdhavanunx kalipxsabeVkAgutatxde. udAharaNege,
gaMdhadhAraNe mADuvAga `gaMdhadAvxrAM durAdhaSARmf' eMba veYdika maMtarxvanunx
paThisalAgutatxde. alilx gaMdha shabadxda parxyoVgaveV gaMdhadhAraNege saMkeVta. Adare Agama
maMtarxgaLalilx neraveVrisabeVkAda upacArada athaRvu sapxSaTxvAgirutatxde. AgamoVkatx
maMtarxpaThaNadiMda manasusx AyA kamaRgaLalilx neDutatxde. BakatxvatasxlanAda shivana pUjeyu
athaRgaBiRtavAgi neraveVrutatxde. AdadxriMda tAMtirxka maMtarx\-gaLu iSaTxliMga\-pUjege
utatxmoVtatxmagaLAgive. veVdAdhayxyaniyAda puruSanAgali, sitxrXVyAgali athavA yAvudeV
sitxrXVpuruSarAgali elalxrigU tAMtirxka maMtarxparxyoVgada adhikAraviruvudariMda,
tAMtirxka maMtarxpaThaNadiMda iSaTxliMgapUjAdigaLanunx mADuvudu tAMtirxkapUjA
eniside:}}

\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx guruvanolisabeVku manava koTuTx liMgavanolisabeVku dhanava koTuTx jaMgamavanolisabeVku I tirxvidhava horagu mADi ha{\re}ya hoyisi kuruha pUjisuva goravara mecacx (savasaM. 1; basava. 206-52).}

\artha{tanu, mana, dhana:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx tanu bayalAyitutx manava koTuTx mana bayalAyitutx dhanava koTuTx dhana bayalAyitutx. I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayala samAdhiyAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1297-457).}

\ullekha{mUjagadalilx ni[ra]taru kUDala\-saMgana sharaNaru tirxvidhava\-nari\-yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 902-235).}
\artha{manaHsathxla, tanusathxla, karasathxla:}

\ullekha{kamaRkAMDa BakitxkAMDa jAcnxnakAMDa I tirxvidhadalilx vaMcakanAdaDe Isu vidhadoLage aMgavilalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 889-232).}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhaniSapxtitx}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{moVkASxthiRge parashivana anugarxha doreyabeVkAdare, Bakatx,
 jaMgama matutx liMga eMba tirxvidha niSapxtitxyAgabeVku. jaMgamanu
 beVDi tananxnunx tAneV kiridu mADikoLuLxtAtxne. iSaTxliMgavu
 kalulxkuTiganiMdAgi kiVLAgutatxde. Bakatxnu tanu mana
 dhanadAsegaLiMda kiVLAgutAtxne. beVDuva \hbox{jaMgamana} baLi hoVgade,
 liMgakekx kalulxkuTigane kataqRveMdu tiLiyade, tanumanadhanagaLa
 benunxhatatxde niSakxlaMka Bakitx toVrisuvavanige parashiva
 oliyutAtxne eMdu cenanxbasavaNaNx heVLutAtxne:}
\ullekha{jaMgama GanaveMbene? beVDi kiridAyitutx. liMga GanaveMbene? kalulxkuTigara keYya mADisikoMDu kiridAyitutx. Bakatx GanaveMbeneV tanumanadhana vaMcaneyiMda kiridAyitutx. iMtiV tirxvidhaniSapxtitxyAgadananxkakxra kUDala\-cenanxsaMgamadeVvaneMtolivano? (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1210-418).}
\arthanonum{kirxyAniSapxtitx, BAvaniSapxtitx  matutx jAcnxnaniSapxtitxgaLeV tirxvidha \hbox{niSapxtitx}. iSaTxliMgapUje, parxsAda sivxVkaraNe, gurujaMgama Bakitx muMtAda  bAhayxkirxye\-gaLu niSapxtitxyAgabeVku. nAnu apiRsutitxdedxVne, nAneV  beVre, nananx apaRNe\-yanunx sivxVkarisuva parashivaneV beVre eMba  BAva niSapxtitxyAgabeVku. nijavAda liMgeYkayxnige tananx arivU  iruvudilalx. tAnu parashivanalilx oMdAgidedxVne eMba arivU  iruvudilalx:}
\ullekha{kirxyA\-niSapxtitx BAvaniSapxtitx jAcnxnaniSapxtitxyeMba tirxvidha guru\-gaLu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 789-222).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhA ca asw niSapxtitxshacx - tirxvidhaniSapxtitxH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhapAdoVdaka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gurupAdoVdaka, liMgapAdoVdaka matutx jaMgamapAdoVdaka eMba mUru vidhada pAdoVdaka\-gaLu. ivugaLige karxmavAgi diVkASxpAdoVdaka, shikASxpAdoVdaka matutx jAcnxnapAdoVdakagaLeMba hesarU ide. liMgavanunx muTaTxde, pAdoVdakavanunx aidu beraLugaLiMda nAlageya meVle hAkikoLuLxvudeV gurupAdoVdaka athavA diVkASxpAdoVdaka. liMgavanenxtitx adara taLadalilx niMtiruva pAdoVdakavanunx sivxVkarisuvudeV liMgapAdoVdaka athavA shikASxpAdoVdaka; baTaTxlinalilx sheVKaravAgiruva pAdoVdakavanunx etitx seVvisuvudu jaMgamapAdoVdaka athavA jAcnxnapAdoVdaka:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
diVkaSxyApagatadevxYtaM yajfjAcnxnaM gurushiSayxyoVH |\\[1pt]
AnaMdaseyxYkayxmeVteVna diVkASxpAdoVdakaM samxqqtamf ||\\[1pt]
gurushiSayxmayaM jAcnxnaM shikASx yoVginamiVyaRteV |\\[1pt]
tayoVH samarasatavxM hi shikASxpAdoVdakaM samxqqtamf ||\\[1pt]
tadeYkayxsaMpadAnaMdajAcnxnaM jAcnxnagurumaRtaH |\\[1pt]
tatAsxmarasayxM shiSayxsayx jAcnxnapAdoVdakaM viduH ||\\[4pt]
\pauthor{(si.shi., 19.6, 12, 19)}
\end{shl}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{upAdhiBakatxMge guruliMgajaMgamada sadaBxkitx doreyuvudayAyx, nirupAdhika BakatxMge tirxvidhapAdoVdaka parxsAda doreyuvudayAyx sahaja BakatxMge sacicxdAnaMdapada doreyuvudayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 932-295); iMtiV tirxmUtiRgaLa tirxvidhapAdoVdakava koMDu enanx tirxkamaRM\-gaLu nAsitxyAduvAgi, aKaMDeVshavxrA, enanx huTuTxhoMdu\-gaLu naSaTxvAduvayAyx (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 776-353).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhaM ca tatf pAdoVdakaM ca - tirxvidhapAdoVdakaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{dashavidhapAdoVdaka}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gurupAdoVdaka, liMgapAdoVdaka, jaMgamapAdoVdaka, sapxshaRnoVdaka, avadhAnoVdaka, ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasotxVdaka, pariNAmoVdaka, ninARmoVdaka matutx satoyxVdaka eMba hatutx bageya pAdatiVthaR: tAtivxka\-daqSiTx matutx kirxyAdaqSiTx eMba eraDu riVtigaLalilx I dashavidhapAdoVdakagaLanunx viMgaDisabahudu. tAtivxka\-daqSiTxyalilx sapxshaRna guNadiMda baMdudu gurupAdoVdaka, aMgada guNavu nAsitxyAdalilx liMgapAdoVdaka, mahAgaNagaLa arivanunx paDedudu jaMgamapAdoVdaka, catudaRLapadamxvu vikasitavAgalu sapxshaRnoVdaka, liMgakekx parama pariNAmavanunx samapiRsidAga avadhAnoVdaka, liMgAroVgaNe mADidalilx ApAyxyanoVdakavu, liMgavanunx hasatxdalilxDalu hasotxVdaka, shivayoVgavuMTAdAga pariNAmoVdaka, nAmasiVmeyilalxvAdaMdu ninARmoVdaka hAgU shUnayxdalilx beretAga satoyxVdaka eMdAgutatxve. AcaraNeya daqSiTxyiMda, pAdagaLige saMbaMdhapaTuTxdu gurupAdoVdaka, A tiVthaRvanunx liMgasaMbaMdha mADuva iceCxyuMTAdalilx liMgoVdaka, majajxnakekx eredAga majajxnoVdaka athavA jaMgamapAdoVdaka, jihevxyalilx seVvisidAga sapxshaRnoVdaka, adanunx ecacxrikeyiMda seVvisidare avadhAnoVdaka, seVvaneya naMtara taqpitx hoMdidalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasatxda tiVthaRvanunx salilxsidalilx hasotxVdaka, baTaTxla tiVthaRvanunx mUru bAri seVvisidare pariNAmoVdaka, ninARmoVdaka matutx barxhamxraMdharxdalilxruva cidamaqtaveMdeV BAvisuvudu satoyxVdaka eMdenisutatxve:}
\ullekha{parxthamadalilx pAdoVdaka, divxtiVyadalilx liMgoVdaka, taqtiVyadalilx majajxnoVdaka, catuthaRdalilx sapxshaRnoVdaka, paMcamadalilx avadhAnoVdaka, SaSaThxdalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, sapatxmadalilx hasotxVdaka, aSaTxmadalilx pariNAmoVdaka, navamadalilx ninARmoVdaka, dashamadalilx satoyxVdaka iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakava tiLidukoLaLxbalalx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1361-482); haLaLx hoLe kere bAvi maDu hoMDa cilume, koLa modalAda sAthxnakekx hoVgi parxthamadalilx ``shivashiva, harahara gurubasavaliMga'' eMba maMtarxdhAyxnadiMda pAdavaniTuTx caraNasoVMkiniM pavitarxvAdudakaveV dhULapAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx. AmeVle taMbigeyoLage shoVdhisi basavAkaSxrava liKisuvade gurupAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx; AmeVle acaRnAkirxyegaLa tiVciRsikoMDu nicacx\-parxsAdi saMbaMdhAcaraNeyaMte mugidalilx jaMgamapAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx; ...hasatxviTuTx sapxshaRnava mADe sapxshaRnoVdakavenisuvadayayx liMgakekx dhAreyiMda aBiSeVkava eredalilx avadhAroVdakavenisuvadayayx. liMgApiRtava mADabeVkeMba AnaMdave ApAyxyanoVdakaveMdenisuvadayayx. apiRtamuKadalilx hasatxva parxkASxlisi KaMDitava mADidalilxge hasotxVdakavenisuvadayayx. liMgakekx saMtaqpitx pariyaMtaravu apiRtava mADi[dalilx] pariNAmoVdakavenisuvadayayx. taTeTx baTaTxla leVhava mADidalilx ninARmoVdakavenisuvadayayx. leVhava mADida meVle darxvayxvanArisi savARMgadalilx leVpisuvade satoyxVdakavenisuvudayayx. iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakada vicArava tiLidu AmeVle nicacxparxsAdiya saMbaMdhAcaraNeyaMte parxsAdava mugivadayayx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 71-21).}}
%\ullekha{dashavidhapAdoVdakavesagida[resa]ka eMteMdaDe... (savasaM. 1; basava. 1214-334); ayayx! muMde matayxRloVkada mahAgaNaM\-gaLu... dashavidhapAdoVdaka, EkAdashaparxsAda, SoVDashAvaraNa... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 802-233); parxthamadalilx pAdoVdaka, divxtiVyadalilx liMgoVdaka... iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakava tiLidukoLabalalx... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1361-482); ayAyx, sadAcAra sadaBxkitx satikxrXyA samayxkAjxcnXna sadavxtaRne... dashavidhapAdoVdaka EkAdashaparxsAda SoVDashaBakitxnivARha... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 37-15); samarasa pAdoVdakadalilx liVyavAda sharaNaMge... dashavidhapAdoVdakavanariyadidaR pAdoVdaka tAneyAgi... (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 922-274).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{dashavidhaM ca tatf pAdoVdakaM ca - dashavidhapAdoVdakaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

(savasaM. 2; alalxma. 187-60); pArxNa apAna vAyxna udAna samAna nAga kUmaR kaqkara deVvadatatx dhanaMjaya - iMtiV dashavAyu\-gaLu (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 789-222); pArxNa apAna vAyxna udAna samAna nAga kUmaR kaqkara deVvadatatx dhanaMjayaveMba dashavAyugaLiceCxyalilx suLidADadu (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 747-275); pArxNa, apAna, udAna, samAna, nAda, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVvadatatx, dhanaMjayaveMba dashavAyuva keDemeTiTx (savasaM. 9; apapxNaNx. 1040-324); iDA piMgaLa suSumanx gAMdhAri hasitx jihevx... dhanaMjayaneMba dashavAyu\-gaLu tAnidaRlilx... (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 595-272); dhanaMjayaniM shoVkarAgaMgaLahavu (viveVka. 34).}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{= dhAraNa:}
\ullekha{A parashivamUtiRye iSaTxliMga\-veMba BAvaneyiMda aSaTxvidhAcaRne SoVDashoVpacayaRMgaLiMdiSaTxliMgadhAraNadiMda ipupxdu dhAraNayoVga (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1141-357); A liMgava BAva, mana, karaNa muKayxvAda savARMgadalilx dharisuvudiVga dhAraNayoVga (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 364-170); \hbox{manava} sakaleVMdirxyaM\-gaLa keVrigaLalilx sUsaliVyade dharisikoMDihudeV dhAraNayoVga noVDA aparxmANakUDala\-saMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 359-164); inunx dhAraNayoVgada lakaSxNaveMtene~: saMkalapx vikalApxtamxkavAda manasusx kAkAkiSxyaMte bAhAyxBayxMtara\-gaLige tAneV kAraNavapupxdariMde A manamaM mudArxkaraNa\-baMdhaMgaLiMdaMtamuRKamaM mADi, anavaciCxnanx teYladhAreyaMte shiva\-dhAyxnamaM mADutiralu A dhAyxnAkAradiM karigoMDa vasutx\-vinoLu A manavu nishacxlamAgaladeV dhAraNayoVga noVDA aKaMDeVshavxrA (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 737-332); dhAyxnisidalilx AyA liMga\-gaLu AyA cakarxgaLalilx sAthxpayxvAguvuvu. idariMda BAva, karaNa, mana muKayxvAda savARMgadalilx A liMgavu toLagi beLagahatatxlu A liMgadoDane AcaraNe\-gaLuMTAguvuvu. ideV dhAraNayoVgavu (shivAkoV. 48-44).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{dhAraNasayx yoVgaH - dhAraNayoVgaH}}
\end{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{dhAmiRka hAgU neYtika kirxyegaLige saMbaMdhapaTiTxruva kirxyAcAra, jAcnxnAcAra, BAvAcAra, satAyxcAra, nitAyxcAra, dhamARcAra matutx savARcArasaMpatitxnAcAra eMba sapAtxcAragaLalilx oMdu; shivAnugarxhadiMda doretudaralilx Asakitx\-yiMda kUDiruvudu:}
\ullekha{taTuTxmuTuTx soVMkugaLilalxde liMgANatiyiMda baMdodagida pariNAmaparxsAdadalilx loVlupatxnAgipuRde nitAyxcAraveMbenayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 930-294); nitAyxcAradiMda vAyu\-gaLu mahAparxsAdavAguvavayayx (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 692-382); liMgAcAra BaqtAyxcAra shivAcAra gaNAcAra sadAcAra kirxyAcAra jAcnxnAcAra BAvAcAra satAyxcAra nitAyxcAra dhamARcAra savARcArasaMpatetxMba parxsAdaliMgasaninxhita sharaNaMge varxta niyama CalAdi mithAyxcAraveVnU parxyoVjanavalalx kANA (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 628-188); liMgANatiyiMda baMdudanunx seVvisutatx parxsAdadalilx loVlupatxnAgiruvudu nitAyxcAravu. idariMda manuSayxnu mahAparxsAdi eMdenisikoLuLxvanu (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 68-121).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{nitayxshacx asw AcArashacx - nitAyxcAraH}}
\end{entry}
%satayx sadugxNa nitAyxcAra dhamaRvilalxveMbavane holeya. (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 648-241);

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{nididhAyxsa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{moVkASxpeVkeSxya sAdhanagaLAda sharxvaNa, manana matutx nididhAyxsana eMba mUru parxkAragaLalilx oMdu; garxhisida viSayavanunx kuritu mADuva ALavAda ciMtane, niraMtaravAda anusaMdhAna:}
\ullekha{AtAmxvA\char'263reV darxSaTxvayxH shorxVtavoyxV maMtavoyxV nididhAyxsitavayxH iMteMba maMtArxthaRva miVri namoV hiraNayxbAhaveV hiraNayxvaNARya hiraNayxrUpAya hiraNayxpatayeV aMbikApatayeV umApatayeV pashupatayeV namoV namaH (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 946-286); eMdipeRnoV nijasuKadalilx ...ma{\ra}ve saMshaya vipariVtada mU{\ru} ku{\ru}hudoV{\ra}lu baLikavada{\ri}Mda me{\re}va susharxvaNa manana nididhAyxsade{\ra}kavilalxde savxtaMtarxteyoLu (keYvasa. 147-52-4).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{nidheVH dhAyxsanaM - nidhidhAyxsaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{nididhAyxsana}
\meaning{\artha{sharxvaNa, manana, nididhAyxsana eMba parabarxhamx

viSayavanunx EkAgarxteyiMda niraMtaravAgi mADuva anusaMdhAna:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
niraMtaraM vicAroV yaH shurxtAthaRsayx guroVmuRKAtf |\\[1pt]
taninxdidhAyxsanaM porxVkatxM tacecxYkAgerxyXVNa laBayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(paMcadashiV)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{A sharxvaNa mananavA nididhAyxsanavene tirxpuTiBeVdaMgaLiMdaM puTiTx rAjisipaR paroVkaSxdanuBavaM bAdhakakakxlilxyiV nepadoLiMtAge veVdAMta vAkayxsharxvaNavAgi parxdhAnavahudeY (viVsheYpu. 5-82-11).}
\artha{mahAliMgasavxrUpavAda adevxYta shivaceYtanayxrUpa barxhamxjAcnxna sAdhanaBUtavAda sAdhanagaLalilx
oMdu. vijAtiVya parxtayxya tirasAkxrapUvaRkavAgi sajAtiVya parxtayxyada parxtiSeThxyAda
AvAhaneyeV nididhAyxsana. yoVgashAsatxrXdalilx idanunx samAdhi eMdu kareyalAgide.
vijAtiVya parxtayxya tirasAkxrapUvaRka sajAtiVya parxtayxyapArxvAhiVkaraNaM:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

\medskip
\pauthor{(viV.A.caM., pu.~5)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BeVda-nididhAyxsanavu savikalapxka matutx niviRkalapxka eMdu eraDu
vidha. niviRkalapx eMdare parabarxhamx. parabarxhamxnanunx sAkASxtAkxra mADikoLaLxlu
asamathaRrAdavarige visheVSavAda nirUpaNeyanunx niVDuvudu niviRkalapxnididhAyxsana. yama,

\begin{shl}

\ullekha{paMcapaMcAkaSxriya GanapaMcakalashadoLu madhayxkalashake mUlavenipa paMcAkaSxriyanucacxrisi saMsakxrisi (viVsheYpu. 7-105-42); {\bf paMcakaLasha.} I paMcakaLashaMgaLaM viracisutatxlA shirxV paramagurumUtiRyadhika kaLashAcAyaRreV pariyenalekx pAdAcaRnege yoVgayxdupadeVshakataRM nAlavxra A pUvaR\-vilasitAcAyaRreMdeV samxrisutoVpasAdAKayxnAmadinaMtavagaRLaM sAthxpanaM mADi (viVsheYpu. 7-103-60); uragabaMdhAkAradiMdalilx taMtu swMdaradiMda paMcakaLashaMgaLoLagaM kUtuR gurukaLashamuKayxkekx paMcapaMcakataMtuviMda pari\-veVSiTxsuvudu (viVsheYpu. 7-105-35).}}

\ullekha{gurukAruNayxva haDeda Bakatxnu hiMdaNa pUvARsharxyava berasidaDe gurudorxVha liMgadorxVha jaMgamadorxVha AcAradorxVha parxsAdadorxVha iMtiV paMcamahApAtakaM\-gaLu BakatxMgalalxde Bavigelilxyado (savasaM. 1; basava. 768-195).}
\artha{aMgada meVle parxtiSAThxpisida liMgavanunx tegeduhAkuvudu, diVkeSx paDeyadavariMda AhAravanunx sivxVkarisuvudu, parxtimegaLanunx pUjisuvudu, parxsAdasaMbaMdhavanunx tiLiyadiruvudu, pArxNa\-vanunx liMgadalilx nelegoLisadiruvudu eMba aidu bageya hiVna kAyaR\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVle liMgaparxtiSeThxyane mADi hiMgidaDe parxthama pAtaka BavipAkakekxLasidaDeraDaneya pAtaka, parxtumAdigaLige{\ra}gidaDe mU{\ra}neya pAtaka, parxsAdasathxlavana{\ri}yadidadxDe nAlakxneya pAtaka, suLuhaDagi liMgaliVyava mADadidadxDe aidaneya pAtaka, iMtiV paMcamahApAtakava kaLeyabalalxDe tiLiyabeVku ...nimamx sharaNanAgabalalxDe (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 181-53).}

\ullekha{aMgada meVlaNa liMgava hiMgi sAthxvaraliMgakekxraguva BaMgitara muKava noVDalAgadu ...aMtapapx paMcamahApAtakara muKadatatx toVradirA (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 704-193); guruvinalilx upadeVsha paDedu parxsAdakekx sUtakava mADuva paMcamahApAtakaru niVvu keVLi BoV (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 574-216).}}
%\arthanonum{shivasharaNaru niSidadhxvAda aneVka bageya AcaraNegaLanunx paMcamahApAtakagaLeMdu ulelxVKisidAdxre. avugaLalilx kelavanunx meVle sUcisalAgide.}}

\begin{entry}

\artha{shivapUjA\-kAladalilx pAlisabeVkAda Atamx, sAthxna, darxvayx, liMga matutx maMtarxshudidhxgaLeMba aidu bageya neYmaRlayx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{Atamxshudidhx sAthxna\-shudidhx darxvayxshudidhx liMgashudidhx maMtarxshudidhxyeMba paMcashudidhxgaLaM visatxrisuvada{\ra}lilx shwcAcamana sAnxna Basamx rudArxkaSxdhAraNa kavaca maMtarx kalAnAyxsa dhAyxnAdi racanaMgeYvudeV Atamxshudidhxyenisuvudu samAmxjaRnAnuleVpana vaNaRka gaMdha puSapx dhUpa diVpAdi nimaRloVpakaraNaMgaLiM cwkamanalaMkaripudeV sAthxna\-shudidhxyenisuvudu jalagaMdhAkaSxte puSApxdigaLaM niriVkiSxsi Basamx maMtarxvArigaLiM saMporxVkaSxNaMgeYvudeV darxvayxshudidhxyenisuvudu anAmike madhayxmegaLa madhayxdalilx naviVnakusumaviDidu aMguSaThxtajaRnigaLiM modala nimARlayxmaM tayxjisi liMgapiVThamaM vAriyiM parxkASxlanaMgeYvudeV liMgashudidhxyenisuvudu sakalapUjAthaRmAgi OM namaH shivAya sAvxhA eMducacxripudeV maMtarxshudidhxyahudu (viveVka. 93).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMca ca tAH shudadhxyashacx - paMcashudadhxyaH}}

\ullekha{``liMgapiVTha\-gaLu samavAgi paMcasUtarx parxmANavu AgamoVkatxdaMte shudadhxvAdare AyureYshavxyaR\-gaLuMTAguvuvu... liMgavaM baLasida sUtarx parxmANaveV 1. liMgapiVThavaM aLeyuvudu, 2. liMgoVnanxta piVThaparxmANa, 3. goVmuKada agarxliMga masatxkaparxmANa, 4. adaradhaRveV goVmuKavu, 5. hiVge paMcasUtarx\-gaLu shivAgamadathaRvu (viVsheYpu. 7neya kAMDa, tAtapxyaRcaMdirxke. puTa 30); iMtu paMcasUtarxmuLaLx piVTha\-liMga\-doLeMdeV jAtishilAdigaLAda kAMtimayavapapx liMga\-sathxlamaM tiVthARMbu paMcagavayx Basita mishorxVdakaMgaLiM paripUtamAda tirxvidha kuMBadoLf... avagAhamirisi (viveVka. 101); A paMcasUtarxda vidhAnaveMtene mahA shirxV paramaliMgamaM baLa\-sidaR sUtarxveV tA pavaNadoMdu sUtarxM liMgapiVThavaLeyalekxraDu liMgoVnanxtaM A piVThadeDeyoLeV mU{\ru} goVmuKadagarx Opa liMgada masatxkakekx nAlakxda{\ra}dhaRveV parikisalekx goVmuKaviMtu paMcasUtarxM shivAgamadathaRveY (viVsheYpu. 7-105-47).} \artha{diVkASxvidhi \hbox{muMtAda} maMgaLakAyaRgaLigAgi sAthxpisuva paMcakalashagaLalilxya gurukalashakekx, maMtarxdhAyxnasahitavAgi uragabaMdhadaMte saMbaMdhi\-suva aidu eLe\-gaLu:} \ullekha{saMcadoVvariyoLage paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci kaMcu\-miMcina saMcalana nuMgitu paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci saMcadoVvarigoMDu paMcamuKa paramaguruvAda sharaNa (padagoV. {\rm v-}2); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMca\-sUtarxMgaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx guru\-kalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMca ca tAni sUtArxNi ca - paMcasUtArxNi}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{pAshupatAgama}}}
\end{entry}

\artha{paramAtamxna savxrUpa; AtamxtatatxvX:}
\ullekha{haqdaya\-kamala madhayxda daLava meTiTx gaLige gaLigege paramahaMsana ArigeyU ariyabAradu  Gamumx Gamemxne sututxvanalalxde! iMtu aSaTxdaLava meTiTx carisuva A paramahaMsana (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1285-378); jAcnxniya pari beVre, ArUDhana pari beVre, paramahaMsana pari beVre (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 559-159); jiVvahaMsa paramahaMsarilalxdaMdu, ajape gAyatirx ilalxdaMdu anaMtakoVTi veVdAgama shAsatxrXpurANaMgaLilalxdaMdu, avAcayx parxNava\-vAgidadxnayAyx namamx kUDala\-saMgamadeVva (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 382-178).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{paramAtamx}
\meaning{\artha{jagatitxnalilx savaRvAyxpiyAgiruva \hbox{ceYtanayx}; parashiva:}
\ullekha{shudAdhxtamx paramAtamxribabxrU oMdu ratanxkekx heNagATa\-vanADiharu. avara heNagATava noVDi A ratanxva seLedukoMDaDe kUDala\-saMgamadeVvaMgAroVgaNeyAyitutx (savasaM. 1; basava. 906-236); shirxVguru koTaTx liMgava biTuTx beVre matetx AtamxtatatxvXva vicArisi noVDabeVkeMdu paramAtamxnalilx yoVgava mADi yoVgigaLAgi mukatxrAdeveMbiri (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1279-404); ``AtamxneV barxhamx\-veMdu heVLuvaMtha veVdAMtiyu'' (basaTiV. {\rm\em{II}}, 254-907 TiVku); paramAtamx parameVshavxra ...nirUpa citetxYsu (basapu. 60-45).}
\artha{jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx matutx paramAtamx eMba AtamxtarxyagaLalilx oMdu; aMtarAtamxnigiMta ucacxsAthxnavanunx paDediruva paramAtamxnu kAraNashariVriyAgi, liMga\-sithxti\-yanunx paDedanaMtara shariVrada savARMgagaLalilxyU ceYtanayx\-vanunxMTumADutAtxne. kAraNashariVradoMdige saMbaMdhisida BAvaliMgavu parxkaTagoMDu Atamxnu suSupitxyalilx shivanalilx aikayxvanunx hoMdutAtxne:}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamxreMdAtamxtarxyaMgaLavaralilx ...loVkavayxvahArakekx sUyaRneMtaMte jiVvAMtarAtamxra vayxvahArasAkiSxkaneV paramAtamxnapapxM (viveVka. 25); AtamxM mU{\ru} BeVdaM ...jiVvAtamxnaMtarAtamxM baLika paramAtamxM ...tatapxrXpaMcadoLf barade silakxde nirAkArarUpinoLihaM paramAtamxM (cebapu. 58-31).}
\artha{jaMgamaliMgasathxladalilxruva olavuliMgada mUru sathxlagaLalilx oMdu; viveVka\-savxrUpiyAda pArxNaliMgiyanunx paramAtamxnu Avarisuva sathxla:} \ullekha{olavu liMga\-tirxvidha: jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 839-246).} 
\artha{Atamxna vikAsakakxnusAravAgi uMTAguva \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, \hbox{jAcnxnAtamx}, mahAtamx, divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMba oMbatutx avasethxgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{vikAsa hoMdida hAge Atamxnu anu\-karxma\-vAgi \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx ...divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutAtxne (shivAkoV. 25-38).}
\artha{mUvatAtxru bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{CatitxVsa tatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxge mahatitxVvaRrilelxnisuvadavxyarUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvoDaLave ...enanx mana oMdipupxdipapxtAtxrenisuvaMtarAtamxnoLalA ipapxtatx ELaneya paramAtamxnoLu nimamx manavipupxdayayx (viVsheYpu. 3-38-33).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paramashacx asw AtAmx ca - paramAtAmx}}
\end{entry}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad parxsAdakalapxnege inUnx vishAlavAda athaRvide. nAvu sivxVkarisuva AhAra pAniVyagaLigaSeTxV alalx, nAvu

 bAgilinalilxyU, aMtaHkaraNada bAgilinalilxyU liMgavanunx
 parxtiSAThxpisikoLuLxtAtxne. aMdare yAvudeV rUpavanunx kaNuNx
 noVDuva modaleV kaNiNxna bAgilinalelxV iruva liMga noVDutatxde; adeV
riVti rasagaMdha, itAyxdigaLanunx Bakatxnu anuBavisuva modaleV
parashivanu anuBavisutAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad matotxMdu athaRdalilx deVheVMdirxyAdigaLeV parxsAda\-gaLu. I riVti yoVcisuva sharaNanu modalu tananx samasatxvanunx shivanigapiRsutAtxne. BAvaliMgada parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMga eMba eraDu BeVdagaLalilx oMdu paramAtamxna IshAnamuKada savxrUpavuLaLx liMga. idara savxrUpa aidu: joyxVtirUpa, shAshavxta, aKaMDa, iMdirxyAdigaLige goVcarisade jAcnxnakekx mAtarx goVcaravAguva, amaqtasavxrUpa, samasatx parxpaMcada pariNAmakekx kAraNavU, upAdhirahitavU Ada sAdAKayxtatatxvXdimda udaBxvisida parAshakitxyiMdoDagUDiruva liMga. liMganiSeThx\-yuLaLxvanu SaTacxkarxgaLa mUlaka tananx deVhadalilx hariyuva shakitxgaLanunx liMgamuKavanAnxgi mADidAga parxsAdaliMgavu vishudidhxcakarxdalilx nelegoLuLxtatxde. ivu sadAshivanige saMbaMdhapaTiTxde. manuSayxnalilxruva citatx, budidhx, ahaMkAra, manasusx, jAcnxna matutx BAvagaLa mUlaka kirxye\-gaLu naDeyutatxve. ivugaLalilx jAcnxnavu parxsAdaliMgakekx saMbaMdhiside. parxsAdaliMgada parxdhAnalakaSxNa\-veMdare AnaMda. beVrebeVreya sathxlagaLige parxsAdaliMgavu saMbaMdhapaTATxga alilx aneVka bageya AnaMdavanunxMTumADutatxde:}}

\begin{entry}
  \word{pArxNaliMgisathxla tirxvidha}

\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAyxtimxka dAriyalilx parxgati sAdhisida Bakatxnu
 karasathxladalilx mAtarxvalalxde, deVhada elelxDeyalilxyU
 liMgasAthxpane mADabeVku. I BAvakekx pArxNaliMgisathxlavenunxtAtxre. idaralilx mUru upaBAgagaLidudx avugaLanunx
 anukarxma\-vAgi AcArapArxNi, liMgapArxNi matutx jaMgamapArxNi eMdu
 kareyalAgide. pArxNaliMgisathxlada modalaneV haMtadalilx Bakatxnu
 bAhayx AcAragaLige hecucx mahatavx koDutAtxne. sAnxna, liMgapUje,
 maMtarx, guru jaMgamagaLalilx \hbox{Bakitx}, parxsAda - pAdoVdaka seVvane,
 muMtAda bAhayx AcAra\-gaLu AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanakekx pArxraMBadalilx
 AvashayxkavAdarU aveV koneyalalx. Bakatx inUnx muMdakekx
 hoVgabeVkAdare, \hbox{shivanu} tananxlilxyeV idAdxneMdu tiLidu, dhAyxnada
 mUlaka shivananunx talupalu parxyatinxsabeVku. I parxyatanxvu
 avananunx liMgapArxNiyanAnxgi mADutatxde. dhAyxnada mUlaka avana
 matutx \hbox{shivana} \hbox{madheyx} dUra kaDimeyAdAga, (athavA avanu terehilalxda
Ganadalilx oMdA\-dAga) avanu tAneV liMgaveMdukoLuLxtAtxne. hiVge avanu
naDedADuva liMgavAdudariMda avanu jaMgama pArxNisathxladalilxdAdxneMdathaR:}
\ullekha{pArxNaliMgisathxlatirxvidha AcArapArxNi liMgapArxNi jaMgamapArxNi adakekx vivara manoVvAkAkxyadalilx AcArava avagarxhisihanAgi AcArapArxNi bAhoyxVpacAraMgaLa ma\char'273\char'311du liMgakekx tananx pArxNavane pUjeya mADuvanAgi liMgapArxNi bAhayxBakitxya ma\char'273\char'311du jaMgamakekx tananx tanu mana pArxNaMgaLa niveVdisuvanAgi jaMgamapArxNi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 987-322).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{pArxNa:}
\ullekha{pArxNAdi vAyugaLa kaLedu BakatxrAdaremamxvaru adeMteMdare neleya pArxNavAyuva nilisidaru pArxNaliMgadalilx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1359-481); alilx pArxNavAyu iMdarxniVlavaNaR kaMDada adhoVBAgeyalidaR haqdayavAdanABi nAshikavadharaMgaLalilx ucACxvXsa nishAvxsaMgaLiMda carisutitxhudu (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 789-222); pArxNavAyu iMdarxlavaNaRniV haqdayasAthxnadalilxduR uMguSaTxtoDagi vANAgarx pariyaMtaradalilx satApxrXNisikoMDu ucACxvXsa nishAvxsanaMgeyudx ananx jiVNiRVkaraNavaMka mADisutitxhudu (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 364-170).} \artha{mUvatAtxru bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{CatitxVsatatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxge mahatitxvaRrilelxnisuvadavxyarUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvoDaLave ...ipapxtatxneya tatatxvXveV pArxNavAyuvAgipupxdadane deYvaveMbarA yoVgi\-gaLu (viVsheYpu. 3-38-34).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaH iti vAyuH - pArxNavAyuH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

sa Eva jAgarxtf paritaqpitxmeVti ||\\

 gurukarasaMjAta eMdu kareyalAgide. diVkiSxta\-nAdavanu
 (AdhAyxtimxkavAgi) matotxMdu janamx paDediruvudariMda hAgU guruveV A
AdhAyxtimxka janamxkekx kAraNanAdudariMda, guruvU saha
barxhamxneV. Adare vAsatxvavAgi shiSayxneV guruvAdare mAtarx avanu
punajARtanenisikoLuLxtAtxneyeV horatu (\hbox{aMdare}, parxtiyobabx
diVkiSxtanU tananxlolxbabx hosa manuSayxnanunx saqSiTxsada horatu),
beVre yAroV horaginavaru ava\-nanunx saqSiTxsalAraru. barxhamxnu heVge
shivananunx saMtuSiTxpaDisalu avanu AjAcnxpisida saqSiTxkAyaRvanunx
mADutAtxnoV (athavA barxhamxna saqSiTxkAyaRvu heVge oMdu pUjeyoV)
hAgeyeV mAnavanU tananxnunx AdhAyxtimxkavAgi parivatiRsikoLuLxva
\hbox{mUlaka} shivana pUjAriyAgabeVku.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viSuNxvu jagatatxnunx rakiSxsuva mUlaka parashivananunx

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad haLeya kamaRkakxnuguNavAgi Ishavxranu tananx tiroVdhAnashakitxya mUlaka elalx jiVvigaLanunx heVge katatxleyalilxTuTx shivana parxkAsha kANadaMte mADutAtxnoV hAgeyeV sAdhakaralilxruva Ishavxranu pApakUkx puNayxkUkx iruva vayxtAyxsavanunx tiLisikoDuva \hbox{mUlaka} shivAnugarxhakekx pAtarxnAgutAtxne. parxtiyobabxrU tamamxlilxruva sadAshiva\-nanunx jAgaqtagoLisuva mUlaka (sadAshivananunx pUjAriyAgi mADikoMDu), nAvu itararige anugarxha toVrisabeVku. parashivananunx kuritu dhAyxnisuva mUlaka, avana bagegina kate, parxvacana itAyxdigaLanunx keVLuva mUlaka, Agama itAyxdigaLanunx adhayxyana mADuva mUlaka nAvu shivayoVgavanunx Acarisabahudu. hiVge AcarisuvudeMdare, namamxlilxruva maheV\-shavxranu parashivananunx pUjisutitxdAdxneMdathaR. sAdhakanu guru\-vina rUpadalilx itararige aSATxMgayoVgavanunx boVdhisi\-dare, Aga avanalilxruva parameVshavxranu parashivana pUjAri\-yAgidAdxneMdathaR. guruvu tananx shiSayxranunx beVreyavaru tuLida AdhAyxtimxka mAgaRdalelxV karedukoMDu hoVguva \hbox{mUlaka}, avanu saveRVshavxranaMte parashivananunx pUjisutitxdAdx\-neMdathaR. keYlAsadalilxruva parxmatharaMte sAdhakaranunx mADidare, aMtha guruvu mahAdeVvaneMba pUjAri.}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{mukitx: parashiva, AkAsha, cidAkAsha, cidaMbara, shUnayx, shUnayxsathxla, niHshUnayx idara payARya pada\-gaLu.} \artha{jagatutx utapxtitxyAguvudakekx muMce idadx sithxti; niravaya; shUnayx:}
\ullekha{ArU ariyada bayaloLage bayalAgi niMda nilava hiDidenanx karadalilx toVride guruve (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 41-16); ADabArada bayalu sUDabArada bayalu nuDiyabArada bayalu hiDiyabArada bayalu I oDalilalxda bayaloLage aDagiduR BeVdava I loVkada jaDaretatx \hbox{balalxreY} (savasaM. 7; jeVDarA. 725-233); jagatutx parxkaTa\-vAgada sithxtiyanunx vacanakAraru bayaleMtalU shUnayxveMtalU niravaya\-veMtalU kareyutAtxre ...idu atayxMta shAMtasatxbadhx \hbox{sithxtiyu}, EneVnU toVrada sithxtiyu (shivAkoV. 1-1).}
\artha{shUnayxdoMdige beretuhoVguvudu, oMdAguvudu; aikayx.}
\artha{rUpavilalxdudu; nirAkAravAdudu.}
\artha{paravasutx; parashiva:}
\ullekha{saqSiTx pUvaRda paravasutxvanUnx shUnayxveMdeV nideRVshisutAtxre. adanunx acacxgananxDa shabadx `bayalu' eMdU nideRVshisutAtxre (shUnayxku. 30).}
\artha{``mithayxvAda mAyAparxpaMcu" (basaTiV. {\rm\em{II,}} 220-859 TiVku):}
\ullekha{naDuve nAnididxheneMdaDe, tanonxDa\-loLage oDedu mUDitutx tananxMte bayalu!... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1339-395); arivaratu kuruhu samamxtavAdare Bakatx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 791-234); Adiyalilx bayalu, aMtayxdalilx bayalu, madhayxdalilx toVri keDuvudadu noVDA, I GaTavu (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1804-515); Ura oLagaNa bayalu, Ura horagaNa bayaleMduMTe ?... (savasaM. 5; boMtAdeV. 1094-724); bayalu mUtiR\-yAgadaMte... (savasaM. 6; amugi. 339-113).}  \artha{bayaladeVhi: paMcaBUtagaLa keTaTx pariNAmavanunx ilalxvAgisidavanu; tananx deVhavanunx parashivana athavA bayalina aMgavanAnxgi (BAgavanAnxgi) mADikoMDavanu:}
\ullekha{I tirxvidhavanu tirxvidhakitutx, tA bayaladeVhiyAdanayAyx A mahAsharaNanu (savasaM. 5; haDaliM. 1250-380).} \artha{bayalasamAdhi: aSaTxvidhasamAdhigaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{pArxNa\-liMgakekx kAraNavAda jaMgamaliMgAnuBavavanunx hoMdidavarige saMbaMdhavu (shivAkoV. 155-383).} \artha{aikayxvAgu; liVnavAgu:} \ullekha{I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayalasamAdhiyAyitutx... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1258-438); vayxkAtxvayxkatxvanoLakoMDu bayalasamAdhiyalilx silukitutx... (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1139-356); kapapxDiya saMgayayxnoLage bayalAdanu (aKaMDeV. 327-28).} \artha{gatisu; maraNahoMdu:} \ullekha{enanx ciMtAmaNiye meVruve enanx sajajxnamitarxneV niVniMdu bayalAdeY (basapu. 35-2).} \artha{bayalapAsha: citfsavxrUpada bayalanunx deVheVMdirxyAdi karaNa\-gaLu baMdhisi, adanunx jiVvAtamxnenisuvaMte mADive. I karaNAdigaLa doVSa nivArisalapxTaTxre, kiridAda (pAshakokxLagAda) bayalu mahAbayalanunx (parashivananunx) seVri oMdAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{sharaNaMge bayalapAsha baMdu kaTiTxralu, bayalaliMga baMdu biDisalu, bayalu bayalu EkavAyitutx (savasaM. 9; hAvina. 1127-353).} \artha{bayalaBArxMta: jiVvanada paramoVdedxVsha parashivaneMba bayalinalilx oMdAguvudu eMbudanunx ariyade kaSxNika aihika vasutxgaLanenxV tamamx dheyxVyavanAnxgi mADikoMDavanu:} \ullekha{atitxtatxlukade... bayalaBArxMtariginenxMtu pArxNaliMgada parxsAda sAdhayxvapupxdu heVLA (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 545-165).}}
\end{entry}
%parashivananunx bayaligeV (AkAshakekxV) Eke hoVlisabeVku eMbudakekx kelavu kAraNagaLive. 1. yAvudeV vasutxvAgali, adu eSeTxV doDaDxdirali, AkAshavu adanunx AvarisikoLuLx\-tatxdeyAdudariMda, elalx vasutxgaLigiMtalU athavA iDiV vishavxkikxMtalU AkAshaveV \hbox{doDaDxdu} enanxbahudu. hAgeyeV elalx vasutxgaLanUnx parashivanu oLagoLuLxvudariMda, avanU AkAshadaMtidAdxne enanxbahudu. vishavxvanonxLagoLuLxva AkAshavu BwtAkAshavAdare vishavxvanUnx, BwtAkAshavanUnx oLagoLuLxva parashivanu cidAkAsha. eraDaneyadAgi, moVDa, dhULu, muMtAda tAtAkxlika GaTane\-gaLu AkAshada mUlasavxrUpavanunx badalAyisuvudilalx. adeV riVti cidAkAshadalilxruva vasutx\-gaLu avu eSeTxV keTaTxdidadxrU cidAkAshavanunx keDisalAravu. mUraneV kAraNa modalaneya eraDu kAraNagaLigiMta muKayxvAdudu. eraDu athavA hecucx vasutxgaLa madheyx iruva AkAshavanunx tiLidukoLaLxbahudeV horatu, vasutxrahita AkAshavananxlalx. eraDu vasutxgaLa madhayxdalilxruva AkAsha doDaDxdu athavA saNaNxdu eMdU, aneVka vasutx\-gaLa madhayxdalilxruva AkAsha cwkAkAradudx, GanAkaqti\-yuLaLxdudx eMdU vaNiRsabahudu. \begin{shl}

baqhatAvxtf baqMhaNatAvxcacx barxhemxVti parikiVtiRtamf ||

\begin{shl}

\pauthor{(kirx. sA., 2. 53)}

\newmeaning{\ullekha{poLevAdishakitxgicACxshakitx janisi parxjavxlisuvaginxsavxrUpadi liMga\-dAkAravaLavaTuTx nilalada{\rO}Lf ...barxhamxsavxrUpaM sakala\-mUtiRgaLa niLayavAgipuRdu (shivaciM. 1-37); nitayxnirALa niraMjana niguRNa atayxdhikAnaMda paripUNaR barxhamxvu (kUDasavx. 63 palalxvi).}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vacanakAraru idanunx eraDu athaRgaLalilx baLasidAdxre. oMdathaR\-dalilx barxhamx eMdare parabarxhamx. parashiva, paravasutx, \hbox{shUnayx}, I pada\-gaLu ``barxhamx''da payARya pada\-gaLu. I athaRdalilx barxhamxnigiMta adhikavilalx. matotxMdathaRdalilx, barxhamxnu viSuNx matutx rudarxra samAna. avana kelasa \hbox{keVvala} kirxyAshakitxya mUlaka carAcaravasutxgaLanunx saqSiTxsuvudu. I athaRdalilx barxhamxnu parashivanige adhiVna. saMsakxqqta dAshaRnika sAhitayxdalilx modalaneyadanunx sUcisalu ``barxhamxnf'' eMba napuMsaka liMgada padavanUnx, eraDaneyadanunx sUcisalu ``barxhAmx'' eMba pulilxMgada padavanUnx baLasalAgutatxde. vacanakArarige I vayxtAyxsa gotitxdadxrU, eraDanUnx sUcisalu barxhamx eMba oMdeV padavanunx baLasutAtxre.}
\artha{SaTAsxdAKayxgaLalilxya oMdu sAdAKayxda adhideVvateyU saqSiTxkAyaRgaLige muKayxsathxnU Adavanu:}
\ullekha{urutara rahasayxdoLagoVMkAraveV kaNA parashivaM baLikA yakArave sadAshivaM ...nakAraM keVLu taruNiyA barxhamxnivanA saqSiTxyirada{\ri}va paraviloVmaM (viVsheYpu. 1-5-55); SaTasxthXlabarxhamxmUtiR\-gaLu -oMdoMdu sAdAKayxkekx obobxbabx adhideVvategaLirutAtxre. parashivana savxrUpagaLeV ivaru eMdu heVLabahudu... 1. parashiva athavA sharaNa athavA jaMgama athavA Atamx 2. sadAshiva 3. shiva 4. rudarx 5. viSuNx 6. barxhamx (shivAkoV. 15-25).}
\artha{paratatatxvXda arivu, jAcnxna:}
\ullekha{barxhamxvanarita matetx sumamxne irabeVku. barxhamxparxsaMgava mADuvalilx parabarxhimxgaLalilx parxsaMgava mADabeVku (savasaM. 6; arimA. 484-151).}
\artha{barxhamx, viSuNx maheV\-shavxrareMba tirxmUtiRgaLalilx \hbox{obabx:}}
\ullekha{barxhAmxbarxhamxrilalxdaMdu, viSuNx\-mAyAjAlavilalxdaMdu ...deVhAhaMkAra parxkaqtiyilalxdaMdu kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayx tAnenanxdidaRnaMdu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1404-501).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{biMdu}
\meaning{\artha{jagatitxna saqSiTxge kAraNavAda nAda-biMdu-kale eMba mUru tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu. jagatitxge kAraNavAda liMgavu nAda-biMdu rUpaveMdu heVLalAgide. nAda-biMdugaLalilx shakitxyu mAtaqsavxrUpiNiyAgidudx biMdu, pitaqsavxrUpiyAda shivanu nAda. iveraDara (nAda-biMdu) samAgamaveV kale:}}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 16-17)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

shivashakotxyXVBaRveVdoyxVgoV jagatfsaqSaTxyXthaRkAraNamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 1. 4. 25)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shUnayxsithxti mugidu, parashivanige saqSiTxmADabeVkenisidAga, avanalelxV avinABAvadiMda iruva avana asapxSaTxrUpada \hbox{shakitxyu} avaniMda parxteyxVkavAgutatxde. I AdirUpada shakitxyeV biMdu:}
\ullekha{EnU EnU ilalxdaMdu bayalu balidu oMdu biMduvAyitutx noVDA A biMdu akaSxratarxyada gadudxgeyalilx kuLiLxralu OMkAra utapxtitxyAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 785-220); tananx liVlAvilAsadiMda tAne sunAda biMdu parxkAsha teVjoVmUtiRyAgi niMdu mahAliMgaveMdenisitutx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-21); nAdadoLagaNa cinAnxdava toVrisayAyx kaleyoLagaNa citakxleya toV\char'273\char'236sayAyx (savasaM. 10; jakakxNa. 1542-681); nAdadoLagaNa cinAnxdava toV{\ri}sayAyx biMdu\-voLagaNa cidibxMduva toV{\ri}sayAyx kaleyoLagaNa citakxleya toV{\ri}sayAyx (savasaM. 11; jakakxNa. 663-1517); AdiyoLu nAdabiMdu\-gaLu Adavivu shivaniMdalutupatige tirxjaga\-doLu ...ava{\ri}MdalaKilajiVvi\-gaLu saMBavisidaru (diVkASxboV. 41-12).}
\artha{parxNavadiMda horahomimxda tAraka, \hbox{daMDaka}, kuMDali, adheRVMdu matutx biMdu eMba paMca\-lakaSxNa\-gaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{parxNavadiMda paMcalakaSxNaM janiyisiduvu tArakaM daMDakaM kuMDalamumadheRVMduvArayeyx biMduvuM paMcalakaSxNamiMtu tArakAkAraM nakAraM makAraveV daMDakaM kuMDalamadu toV{\ru}va shikAramadheRVMduve vakAramada \hbox{seVripaR} biMduve yakAraM (cebapu. 60-20):}
\artha{sakala jiVvarAshiyanUnx hurupugoLisuva paMcashakitxgaLalilx oMdAda parAshakitxyalilxruva biMdu, kuMDalini matutx mAye eMba mUru parxkAragaLalilx oMdu:}

\begin{entry}

\begin{shl}

\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{tirxvidha-(a) kAyikiV, mAnasiV, vAcikiV eMdu Bakitxyu mUru vidha. manasisxnalilx shivasavxrUpAdigaLanunx dhAyxnisuva seVveyeV mAnasiVBakitx, vANiyiMda shivapaMcAkaSxra maMtarxda japa shivasotxVtArxdigaLa paThaNa vAcikiVBakitx athavA vAcikaBakitx matutx shariVradiMda mADida parxdhAnavAda (iSaTxliMga) \hbox{pUjeyeV} kAyikiV Bakitx enisutatxve. anAyxtamxviditaM bAhayxM shaMBoVraBayxcaRnAdikamf |\\

\pauthor{(si. shi., 9. 16-17, 20)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) Bakitxyu utatxma, madhayxma matutx kaniSaThx eMdu mUru vidha. iSaTxliMgakikxMtalU jaMgamanalilx Bakitxyu adhikavAgidadxre utatxma Bakitx. iSaTxliMga matutx jaMgama ibabxralilxyU samAnavAda Bakitx madhayxmaBakitx matutx iSaTxliMgakikxMtalU jaMgamana viSayadalilx Bakitxyu kaDimeyAgidadxre, adu kaniSaThxBakitx enisutatxde:}}

\newmeaning{\artha{aidu vidha:- tapasusx, kamaR, japa, dhAyxna, jAcnxna-eMdu aidu vidha. ivu paMcayajacnx athavA shivayajacnx eMdu parxsidadhxvAgive:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{BaritApaRNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{BaritApaRNaveMdare taqpitxyAguvavaregU apaRNe mADuvudu
 eMdathaR. I athaRkekx eraDu magugxlugaLive: apaRNe mADuva Bakatxnu
 tanage taqpitxyAguva\-varegU apiRsabeVku eMbudu oMdu magugxlAdare,
 apaRNe sivxVkarisuva guru, liMga matutx jaMgamarige taqpitxyAguva\-varegU apiRsabeVku eMbudu matotxMdu magugxlu. ivu
 parasapxra saMbaMdhavuLaLx athaR\-gaLu eMbudanunx nAvu
 mareya\-bAradu. cenanxkUDala\-rAmeVshavxra liMga eMba aMkitavaninxTuTxkoMDu vacana\-gaLanunx barediruva BaritApaRNada cenanxbasavaNaNxnu BaritApaRNada kelavu niyamagaLanunx tiLisidAdxne. avu\-gaLalilx muKayxvAda kelavu hiVgive:}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{hasivu athavA nAlageya capalavanunx tiVrisikoLuLxva
 udedxVshadiMda padeV padeV liMgApiRta mADi AhAra sivxVkarisuvudu
 sAvxthaRveV horatu, BaritApaRNavalalx.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{namage EnelalxvanUnx koTiTxruvudAgi, nAvu paramAtamxnige
 kaqtajacnxte toVrisabeVku. avanige toVrisuva BakitxyeV A
 kaqta\-jacnxteya vayxkatxrUpa. kaqtajacnxte toVrisade hAgeyeV
 Bujisuvudu Bakitxyanunx maretaMte; `Bakitxya maredu, satayxva
 toreda, dumaRtatxMge BaritApaRNavilalx'.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{noVDi anuBavisi, anaMtara muTiTx anuBavisi apiRsuvudu
BaritApaRNavalalx, vasutxgaLanunx noVDuva munanx, \hbox{muTuTxva} munanx,
manasisxnalelxV BakitxpUvaRkavAgi apiRsabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{beleveNuNxgaLa sahavAsa, parasitxrXVgamana, husi, kole, hiMse
 kaLavugaLanunx mADade, maqSATxnanxvanunx iciCxsade, iruvudanunx

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{tAnu mADutitxruva aneYtikateyanunx aritukoMDu, matetx adanunx
 mADadaMte parxtijecnx mADi, adaraMte naDedukoLuLxvudeV
 BaritApaRNa.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{deVhada duSaTx parxBAvakekx oLagAgade, iMdirxyaviSayagaLige

\newmeaning{\artha{apiRsuvAga janara sutxtiniMdegaLige gamana koDabAradu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{parxti tutatxnunx tiMdu taqpitxpaDuvAgalU liMgakekx apiRsida
 taqpitxBAvavirabeVku. satisaMga mADuvAgalU apaRNA\-BAvavirabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{mana liMgadalilx nelegoMDu, nAnu matutx liMga beVre beVre eMba uBayaBAva aLidu mADuva apaRNeyeV BaritApaRNe:}
\ullekha{liMgakekx baMdu saMduda AnaMdadiMda sivxVkarisi niMdude BaritApaRNa AcArave pArxNavAda rAmeVshavxraliMgadalilx (savasaM. 5; akakxmamx. 525-163); sahaBoVjanada samavanaritu, BaritA\-paRNava apiRtavanaritu, tA lakiSxsida varxtada kaTaTxLeya kaMDu (savasaM. 6; EleVshavx. 1662-635); BaritApaRNa sahaBoVjana neYveVdayx saha iMtiV tirxvidha BeVdaMgaLa aMgiVkarisida (savasaM. 8; Barice. 413-150); BaritApaRNaveMdu liMgakekx samapiRsida matetx parxtiparxsAdaveMdudoMbalilx BaritApaRNaveMtuMTAyitu (savasaM. 9; shirxV \hbox{mukitxrA}-(6-4-7)); apaRNavAdudanunx seVvisaleVbeVku. adanunx tayxjisakUDadu. AdadxriMda manuSayxnu tanage saluvaSaTxnenxV garxhisi liMgApiRta mADabeVku idu BaritApaRNavu (shivAkoV. 77-145).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{BasomxVtApxdana}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{Basamxda tayArike. goVmayadiMda Basamxda tayArike. idakekx BasamxsaMpAdana eMba nAmAMtaravU ide. maMtorxVcAcxraNeyiMda goVmayavanunx suTuTx Basamxvanunx tayArisuvudu, paMcAkaSxra maMtarx\-diMda modalige hasuvanunx aBimaMtirxsabeVku. aSoTxVtatxra\-shata (108) maMtarxdiMda aBimaMtirxsida hululx matutx niVranunx hasuvige koDabeVku. shukalxpakaSx athavA kaqSaNxpakaSxda catudaRshiyaMdu upavAsavidudx, pArxtaHkAladalilx edudx shuci\-BURtanAda sAdhakanu sithxracitatxnAgi sAnxnamADi, shuBarxvasatxrXgaLanunx dharisi \hbox{hAlanunx} kareyalu hasuvanunx sidadhxgoLisabeVku. hasuvanunx meVlebibxsi \hbox{gAyatirx} maMtarxdiMda goVmUtarxvanunx cinanx athavA beVrAvudeV loVhada pAterxyalilx saMgarxhisabeVku. goVmaya(sagaNi)yu BUmige biVLuva \hbox{munanxveV} saMgarxhisabeVku. eMTu sala mUla(paMcAkaSxriV) maMtarx\-vanunx japisi goVmUtarx matutx goVmayavanunx misharxNa mADi soVsabeVku. `BavAya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda goVmaya\-doMdige goVmUtarxvanunx misharxNamADi, `shavARya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda hadinAlukx uMDegaLanunx mADabeVku. A uMDegaLanunx bisilinalilx ELu sala paMcAkaSxramaMtarxdiMda oNagisabeVku. anaMtara aginxyanunx sidadhxpaDisi, parxNavasahita paMcAkaSxriyanunxcacxrisutatx A uMDegaLanunx aginxyalilx iDabeVku. vividha maMtarxgaLiMda elalx bageya AhutigaLanunx apiRsi `sadoyxVjAtaM parxpadAyxmi' itAyxdi maMtarx\-gaLiMda shivAginxyalilx suTuTx oNagida Basamxvanunx shoVdhisabeVku (soVsabeVku). iMtaha Basamxvanunx matetx goVmUtarxdoMdige misharxNamADi Basamxda gaTiTxgaLanunx tayArisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\begin{shl}
shivaBakatxjanAH saveRV variSAThxH paqthiviVtaleV |\\
teVSAM BaqtoyxV{\char'263}hamiti yadf BaqtAyxcAra iti samxqqtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 9. 9)}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{satayx sadAcAra saMbaMdhavAda BaqtAyxcAra enagilalxyAyx Anu nimamx neneyalu enage BakitxyilalxyAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 1378-380); tananx muTiTx niVDidude parxsAda tananx \hbox{muTaTx[de]} niVDidude Ogara liMgakekx koTuTx koMDaDe parxsAdi. idu kAraNa-iMtapapx BaqtAyxcArigalalxde parxsAdavilalx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 166-53); gurukAraNayxM paDedu aMgada meVle liMgasAhitayxvAda baLika BakatxnAgali jaMgamanAgali Bakitx BaqtAyxcAra saMpananxrAgi guruliMga jaMgamavanArAdhisi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1154-395); niVneMbuduMTAgi BaqtAyxcAravilalx nAneMbuduMTAgi ahaMkAravilalx (savasaM. 4; \hbox{sidadhxrA.} 1267-364); liMgAcAraveMdu, sadAcAraveMdu, shivAcAraveMdu BaqtAyxcAraveMdu gaNAcAraveMdu shivAcAravu aidu teranAgipupxdu noVDayAyx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 314-93); jaMgamaBakatxtiMthiNigaLoDeyarA nALeMdu savaRBoVgaM taLutx BukitxyavarokukxdaM koMDipuRdiVga BaqtAyxcAraveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-8).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{Baqtayxsayx AcAraH - BaqtAyxcAraH}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{paMcAcAra}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{BaqtAyxcAri}
\meaning{\arthanonum{paMcAcAragaLalilx oMdAda BaqtAyxcAravanunx pAlisuvavanu; shivaBakatxru hiriyaru, tAnu kiriyaneMba BAvaneyiMda avaranunx seVvisuvavanu:}
\ullekha{Eta talevAgidaDeVnu, guruBakatxnAgabalulxde ? ikukxLa keYmugidaDeVnu, BaqtAyxcAriyAgabalulxde (savasaM. 1; basava. 125-34); liMgakekx koTuTx koMDaDe parxsAdi, idu kAraNa - iMtapapx BaqtAyxcArigalalxde parxsAdavilalx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 166-53); bekukx nAyi shivaBakatxrokukx mikukxda koMDaDe sadAcAriyAgabalulxde? BaqtAyxcAriyAgabalulxde ?... (savasaM. 7; jeVDadA. 825-255); katuR BaqtAyxcAri pashupati mUtiR basavAmAtayxniM saMpUtiRyAgalu pUjevaDedapevu (basapu. 6-12).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{Baqtayxsayx AcAreV shiVlaM asitx asayx asimxnf vA iti - BaqtAyxcAriV}}
\end{entry}
%BaqtAyxcArigalalxde BakAtxyXcAravaLavaDadu... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 238-77); arivananxkakx BaqtAyxcAri... (savasaM. 6; amudeV. 317-106);

\begin{entry}
\word{BeVda}
\meaning{\artha{soVpAdhi, nirupAdhi, sahaja eMdu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dAnaM ca tirxvidhaM porxVkatxM soVpAdhinirupAdhikamf |\\
sahajaM ceVti saveRVSAM savaRtaMtarxvishAradeYH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 9.80)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{tirxvidhadAna}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{diVkASxpAdoVdaka, shikASxpAdoVdaka, jAcnxnapAdoVdaka eMdu pAdoVdakavu
mUru vidha. ivu karxmavAgi guru, liMga, jaMgamagaLiMda doreyuvaMtahavu\-gaLu.
liMgadhAriyAda viVrasheYvanu yAvudAdarU (guru, liMga, jaMgama\-gaLalilx) oMdu pAdoVdaka
doretarU, mUru pAdoVdakagaLU idaralilx nelesive eMba BAvaneyiMda sivxVkarisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pAdatiVthaRM tirxdhA shaMBoVguRrujaMgamayoVrapi |\\
diVkASx shikASx jAcnxnamiti tirxsaMjacnxM tadaBxvatayxhoV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 5.5)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
diVkASxpAdoVdakaM pUvaRM shikASxpAdoVdakaM tataH |\\
jAcnxnapAdoVdakaM cAtha... ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 19.3)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
guroVshacxrasayx cAlABeV iSaTxliMgapAdoVdakamf |\\
labAdhxyX guvARdipAdoVdaM BAvayeVnamxnaseYva tatf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 5.7)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAkalayx, shAMBava, swKayx, sAvashayx matutx sAyujayx eMdu
parxNavavu aidu vidha. I aidu BeVda\-gaLu parashivana sadoyxVjAtAdi paMcamuKagaLiMda huTiTxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
soV{\char'263}yaM paMcavidhaH porxVkatxH sAkalAyxdiparxBeVdataH |\\
sAkalayxM parxthamaM porxVkatxM shAMBavaM tu divxtiVyakamf ||\\
swKayxM taqtiVyamituyxkatxM sAvashayxM tu catuthaRkamf |\\
sAyujayxM paMcamaM porxVkatxM BeVdameVSAM shaqNu karxmAtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU.A., kirx.pA., 4. 5-6; vA.shu.A., 6. 4-5)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{sAkalayxparxNava, shAMBavaparxNava, swKayxparxNava, sAvashayxparxNava, sAyujayxparxNava}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{paraparxNava matutx aparaparxNava eMdu eraDu vidha. parxjAcnx AnaMdAdi savxrUpavuLaLx
parabarxhamxveV paraparxNava. parakikxMtalU atishayavAda, hosa savxBAvadiMda barxhamxvAgiruva,
pavitarxvAda sAkASxtf shabadxrUpaveV apara parxNava:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
paraH parataraM barxhamx parxjAcnxnaMdAdilakaSxNamf ||\\
parxkaSeRVNa navaM yasAmxtf paraM barxhamx savxBAvataH |\\
aparaH parxNavaH sAkASxcaCxbadxrUpaH sunimaRlaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., 1. 5. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{akAra, ukAra, makAra, OMkAra matutx vAkikxnalilx huTaTxde iruvudu eMdu parxNavavu aidu vidha. akAraparxNavavu nAdarUpadiMda kUDidudx jAgarxtfsAthxnadalilx, ukAraparxNavavu biMdurUpadalilxdudx savxpanxsAthxnadalilx, makAraparxNavavu kalA\-rUpa\-dalilxdudx suSupitxsAthxnadalilx, OMkAravu shakitxrUpadalilxdudx tuyaR\-sAthxnadalilxyU matutx vAkikxnalilx huTaTxde iruvudu (\hbox{avAgajx} parxNava) eMba parxNavavu shivarUpavAgidudx tuyARtiVta\-sAthxnadalilx irutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
akAraM parxthamaM viMdAyxdukAraM tu divxtiVyakamf |\\
taqtiVyaM tu makAraM ca OMkAraM ca catuthaRkamf ||\\
avAgajxM paMcamaM viMdAyxtapxMcaparxNavaBeVdakamf |\\
akAraM nAdarUpeVNa jAgarxtfsAthxneV niveVshayeVtf ||\\
OMkAraM shakitxrUpaM ca tuyaRsAthxneV niveVshayeVtf |\\
tuyARtiVteV hayxvAgajxM ca shivarUpaM vinikiSxpeVtf ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., 1. 5. 16-19)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx eMdu mUru vidha. guruvige
samapiRtavAdadudx shudadhxparxsAda, liMgApiRtavAdadudx sidadhxparxsAda,
jaMgamApiRtavAdadudx parxsidadhxparxsAda enisutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
guruliMgajaMgamAnAM BukatxsheVSaH parxsAdakaH ||\\
shudadhxsidadhxparxsidAdhxKayxH sa hi muketxYkasAdhanaH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 5. 20-21)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shudadhxM sidadhxM parxsidadhxM ca BeVdashecxYSAmathoVcayxteV ||\\
guruBukatxparxsAdoV yaH sa shudadhxH parikiVtiRtaH |\\
liMgApiRtaparxsAdoV{\char'263}yaM sidadhx itayxBidhiVyateV ||\\
carApiRtaparxsAdoV{\char'263}yaM parxsidadhxH parikiVtiRtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU.A., kirx.pA., 8. 22-25)}
\newmeaning{\artha{gaMdhaparxsAda, rasa (ruci) parxsAda, rUpaparxsAda, sapxshaRparxsAda, shabadxparxsAda matutx saMkalapxparxsAdaveMdu parxsAdavu Aru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
gaMdhaparxsAdaM sadaBxkAtxyX citatxhasetxVna cApaRyeVtf |\\
budidhxhasetxVna tu ruciM niSAThxBakAtxyX samapaRyeVtf |\\
BakAtxyX{\char'263}vadhAnayA rUpamahaMkAreVNa cApaRyeVtf |\\
BakAtxyX{\char'263}nuBavayA manoVhasetxVna sapxshaRmapaRyeVtf |\\
parxsAdaliMgeV tivxVshAnamuKeV shabadxparxsAdakamf |\\
AnaMdaBakAtxyX sujAcnxnahasetxVneYva samapaRyeVtf ||\\
mahAliMgamuKeV parashivamuKeV saMkalapxmapaRyeVtf |\\
sadABxvABiKayxhasetxVna BakAtxyX samarasAKayxyA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA.A., kirx.pA., 7. 60-65)}
\newmeaning{\artha{barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri, carAdhikAri matutx nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 3-4)}
\newmeaning{\artha{barxhamxcAriyu neYSiThxka matutx Bwtika eMdu eraDu vidha. yAru bAlayxdiMda badukiruvavarege barxhamxcAriyAgirutAtxneyoV avanu neYSiThxka barxhamxcAri. oMdu nidiRSaTx kAladavarege barxhamxcAriyAgiruvavanu BwtikabarxhamxcAri eMdenisutAtxne. neYSiThxkanu madhayxmanAdare, Bwtikanu adhama enisutAtxne:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
barxhamxcAriV divxdhA porxVkotxV neYSiThxkoV BwtikasitxvXti |\\
neYSiThxkoV madhayxmoV jecnxVyoV Bwtikasutx tatoV{\char'263}dhamaH ||\\
AkwmArAdf barxhamxcAriV yAvajijxVvaM sa neYSiThxkaH |\\
vayxvasithxVkaqtakAlAMnaM barxhamxcAriV punagaqRhiV ||\\
sa BwtikaH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 25. 3-5)}
\newmeaning{\artha{guruBakatx, liMgaBakatx, caraBakatx eMdu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
guruBakotxV liMgaBakatxshacxraBakatxsatxtheYva ca |\\
EvaM BeVdasamAyukatxH sa BakatxH tirxvidhoV BaveVtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8. 36; kirx. sA., BA-3, pu. 122; shi. ta. ra., 9. 9. 39.)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{guruBakatx, liMgaBakatx, caraBakatx}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAraliMga modalAda Aru vidha liMgagaLige saMbaMdhi\-sidaMte parxtiyoMdu liMgakUkx Bakatx, moVhiV, pUjaka, viVra, parxsAdi matutx pArxNi eMdu Aru vidhavAgidudx, oTuTx mUvatAtxru vidha Bakatxru:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
moVhiV BakatxH pUjakashacx tathA viVraparxsAdavAnf |\\
pArxNiV cAcAraliMgAdiH sa veY BakotxV{\char'263}pi SaDivxdhaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8. 37)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{AyA padagaLanunx. udA: AcAra(liMga)Bakatx, guru\-Bakatx itAyxdi.}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{BaqtAyxcAravu Baqtayxtavx matutx viVraBaqtayxtavx eMdu eraDu vidha. guru-liMga-jaMgamagaLa keYMkayARcaraNe Baqtayxtavx enisidare, guru-liMga-jaMgamagaLige tanu-mana-dhana\-gaLanunx samapiRsi mukitxyanenxV paDeyabeVkeMdu bayasuvudu viVraBaqtayxtavx enisutatxde:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BaqtayxtavxM viVraBaqtayxtavxM BaqtAyxcAroV divxdhA mataH |\\
guruliMgajaMgamAnAM keYMkayARcaraNaM hi yatf ||\\
Baqtayxtavxmiti nidiRSaTxM deVvadeVveVna shaMBunA ||\\
deVshikAya tanuM citatxM shaMBaveV ca dhanaM tathA |\\
jaMgamAya samapeyxYRvaM mahoVtAsxhasamanivxtaH ||\\
BakitxmeVva parAM kAMkaSxmANoV yadavatiSaThxteV |\\
tanamxtaM viVraBaqtayxtavxM shivAnugarxhasAdhanamf || 
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 9. 124-126)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sujanarige anugarxhisuva iceCxyiMda mahA\-liMgavu BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMgaveMdu mUru vidhavAyitu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
mahAliMgaM tirxdhA jAtaM sujanAnujiGaqkaSxyA |\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM tu divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVvaM tirxvidhaM matamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 23)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BakAtxdi Aru sathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisida Aru parxkArada liMgagaLalilx mahAliMgavu aikayxsathxlakekx saMbaMdhiside. AdadxriMda idakekx mahAliMgasathxlaveMdU hesaru. I mahAliMgavu piMDajaliMgasathxla, aMDajaliMgasathxla matutx biMdAvxkAshaliMgasathxlaveMdu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
mahAliMgasathxlaM cApi tirxdhA BinanxM shuqNu karxmAtf |\\
piMDajaM parxthamaM porxVkatxmaMDajaM ca tataH paramf ||\\
biMdAvxkAshaM tatoV jecnxVyameVSAM lakaSxNamucayxteV |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8. 26; kirx. sA., BA-3, pu. 121)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{aMDajaliMgasathxla, piMDajaliMgasathxla, biMdAvxkAshaliMga}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{ahiMse, satayx, asetxVya, barxhamxcayaR, aparigarxha eMdu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
yamasutx ahiMsAsatAyxsetxVyabarxhamxcayARparigarxharUpeVNa paMcadhA |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. A. caM., pu. 5)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sitxrXVsaMgarAhitayx matutx savxpatinxVparituSaTxte eMba eraDu vidha barxhamxcayaR, niyataBoVjana (alApxhAra), dhaqti, daye, sUnaqta (satayxvanunx nuDiyuvudu) AjaRva (kuTilate\-rAhitayx), shucitavx, asetxVya (kaLaLxtana mADadiruvudu), adeYnayx ahiMse (akApaRNayx ahiMse)-I hatutx yama\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
subarxhamxcayaRM niyatAshanaM ca\\
dhaqtidaRyA sUnaqtamAjaRvaM ca |\\
shucitavxmasetxVyamadeYnayxhiMseV\\
yamA dasheYteV muniBiH parxNiVtAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 2-10)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAMKayxyoVga, tArakayoVga, amanasakxyoVga eMdu rAjayoVgavu mUru vidha. ipapxtetxYdu tatatxvXgaLa \hbox{jAcnxna} sAMKayxyoVga. manasusx, daqSiTx, pArxNavAyu\-gaLanunx bahimuRKavAgadaMte mudirxsuvudanunx ariyuvudu tArakayoVga. aMtaraMgada manasasxnunx neneyadaMte mudirxsuvudu amanasakxyoVga. ivu\-gaLu utatxroVtatxra sherxVSaThxvAdavu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
soV{\char'263}pi tirxdhA BaveVtf sAMKayxtArakashAcxmanA iti |\\
paMcaviMshatitatAtxvXnAM jAcnxnaM tatf sAMKayx ucayxteV ||\\
bahimuRdArxparijAcnxnAdoyxVgasAtxraka ucayxteV |\\
aMtamuRdArxparijAcnxnAdamanasakx itiVritaH ||\\
shAlxGayxH sAMKayxsAtxrakoV{\char'263}yamamanasokxV{\char'263}pi tArakAtf |\\
rAjatAvxtf savaRyoVgAnAM rAjayoVga iti samxqqtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 10-12)}
\newmeaning{\artha{utapxtitxBeVdadiMda matutx muKaBeVdadiMda rudArxkaSx\-gaLu nAnA bageyAgive.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{parashivana sUyaRneVtarxdiMda kapilavaNaRda hanenxraDu, caMdarxneVtarxdiMda biLiya baNaNxda hadinAru, aginxneVtarxdiMda \hbox{kapupx} baNaNxda hatutx bageya rudArxkaSx\-gaLu utapxtitxyAgi, oTuTx mUva\-tetxMTu BeVdagaLive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
aSaTxtirxMshatfparxBeVdeVna BavaMtuyxtapxtitxBeVdataH ||\\
neVtArxtf sUyARtamxnaH shaMBoVH kapilAH dAvxdashoVditAH |\\
shevxVtAH SoVDasha saMjAtAH soVmarUpAdivxloVcanAtf ||\\
kaqSANx dashavidhA jAtAH vahinxrUpAdivxloVcanAtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 49, 51)}
\newmeaning{\artha{oMdu muKadiMda hadinAlukx muKada rudArxkaSxdavarege muKaBeVdadiMda hadinAru vidha:}
\ullekha{(ru. jA. u., 27-42; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 25-39; si. shi; 7. 54-55; shi. ta. ra., 8. 6. 20-33)}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma eMdu eraDu vidha. sahajavAgi raMdharxviruvaMtahadudx utatxma, puruSaparxyatanxdiMda raMdharxmADidaMtahadudx madhayxma:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
savxyameVva kaqtadAvxraM rudArxkaSxM sAyxdihoVtatxmamf |\\
yatutx pwruSayatenxVna kaqtaM tanamxdhayxmaM BaveVtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 14-15; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 15)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AkAra BeVdadiMda utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu mUru vidha. nelilxVkAyi gAtarxda rudArxkaSxvu utatxma, bAriVhaNiNxna gAtarxdudx madhayxma, kaDalekALu gAtarxdudx adhama enisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dhAtirxVPalaparxmANaM yatf sherxVSaThxmeVtadudAhaqtamf |\\
badariVPalamAtarxM tu madhayxmaM porxVcayxteV budheYH ||\\
utatxmaM caNamAtarxM sAyxtf parxkirxyeYSa mayoVcayxteV |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 8-9; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 9-10)}
\newmeaning{\artha{bArxhamxNa, kaSxtirxya, veYshayx, shUdarx eMba rudArxkaSxvaqkaSxgaLiMda utapxtitxya AdhAradiMda rudArxkaSx\-gaLu nAlukx vidha. biLibaNaNxdudx bArxhamxNa, keMpu baNaNxdudx kaSxtirxya, haLadi baNaNxdudx veYshayx, kapupx baNaNxdudx shUdarx vaqkaSxgaLiMda janisive. bArxhamxNAdi\-gaLu karxmavAgi biLi, keMpu, haLadi, kapupx \hbox{baNaNxda} rudArxkaSxgaLanunx dharisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
bArxhamxNAH kaSxtirxyAH veYshAyxH shUdArxshecxVti shivAjacnxyA |\\
vaqkASx jAtA paqthivAyxM tu tajAjxtiVyAH shuBAkaSxkAH ||\\
shevxVtAsutx bArxhamxNA jecnxVyAH kaSxtirxyA rakatxvaNaRkAH |\\
piVtA veYshAyxsutx vijecnxVyAH kaqSANxH shUdArx udAhaqtAH ||\\
bArxhamxNoV biBaqyAceCxvXVtAnf rakAtxnf rAjA tu dhArayeVtf |\\
piVtAnf veYshayxsutx biBaqyAtf kaqSANxnf shUdarxsutx dhArayeVtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 10-12; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 11-13)}
\newmeaning{\artha{mahAliMga. aKaMDa. avayxkatx:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
apariciCxnanxmavayxkatxM liMgaM barxhamx sanAtanamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 36)}
\newmeaning{\artha{jaMgamaliMga, ajaMgamaliMga eMdu eraDu vidha. shivayoVgiyu jaMgamaliMga, maNuNx, mara, shilegaLiMda nimARNa\-vAdadudx ajaMgamaliMga (sAthxvaraliMga):}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgaM ca divxvidhaM porxVkatxM jaMgamAjaMgamAtamxnA |\\
ajaMgamaM tu yalilxMgaM maqciCxlAdivinimiRtamf |\\
tadavxraM jaMgamaM liMgaM shivayoVgiVti vishurxtamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 9. 60-61)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga eMdu mUru vidha. ivu\-gaLu karxmavAgi sUthxlaliMga, sUkaSxmXliMga, parAtapxra liMga\-veMdu parxsidadhxvAgive. BAvaliMgakekx taqpitxliMga eMba matotxMdu hesarU ide. iSaTxliMgavu sakala, pArxNaliMgavu sakalaniSakxla, BAvaliMgavu niSakxla eMdenisive. iSaTxliMgavu kaNiNxna kaleyiMda gArxhayx, pArxNaliMgavu manoVgArxhayx, BAvaliMgavu BAvagArxhayxvAdudu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
mahAliMgaM tirxdhA jAtaM sujanAnujiGaqkaSxyA |\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM tu divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf ||\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVvaM tirxvidhaM matamf |\\
niSakxlaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdABxvagArxhayxM parAtapxramf |\\
pArxNaliMgaM manoVgArxhayxM BaveVtf sakalaniSakxlamf ||\\
sakalaM daqkakxlAgArxhayxmiSaTxliMgaM parxkiVtiRtamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx, pA., 3. 23-25)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgaM tu tirxvidhaM porxVkatxM sUthxlasUkaSxmXparAtapxramf |\\
iSaTxliMgamidaM sUthxlaM yadf bAheyxV dhAyaRteV tanw ||\\
pArxNaliMgamidaM sUkaSxmXM yadaMtaBARvanAmayamf |\\
parAtapxraM tu yatf porxVkatxM taqpitxliMgaM taducayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 49-50)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
aKaMDameVkaM liMgaM sAyxtf tadeVva guruNA paramf |\\
BAvapArxNeVSaTxBeVdeVna tirxdhA BUtaM nagAtamxjeV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\artha{parabiMdu, paranAda, aparabiMdu, aparanAda eMdu nAlukx vidha. ivugaLa viBAgavu liMgada meVlina matutx keLagina BAgagaLanunx Adhariside. elalxdakikxMta keLagina BAga aparabiMdu, adara meVle aparanAda, adakUkx meVle parabiMdu matutx elalxkUkx meVle paranAda:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tadeVva shivaliMgaM hi talilxMgaM tu catuviRdhamf |\\
parabiMduH paroV nAdashAcxparoV biMdunAdakw |\\
upayaRdhoVBAganiSAThxshacxtAvxroV{\char'263}pi surAciRta ||\\
adhaH sAyxdaparoV biMdusatxdUdhavxRmaparoV dhavxniH |\\
tadUdhavxRM parabiMduH sAyxtf paranAdasatxdUdhavxRgaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BUmiya vikArasavxrUpadiMda sAvxyaMBuvaliMga, biMdu\-liMga, parxtiSiThxtaliMga, caraliMga, guruliMga eMdu aidu vidha. tAnAgiyeV udaBxvavAdaliMga sAvxyaMBuva, biMdu-nAdagaLiMda kUDidudu biMduliMga, mahAtamxru matutx shAsatxrXjacnx\-riMda maMtorxVcAcxradiMda sAthxpisidudx parxtiSiThxtaliMga, soMTa modalAda shariVrada nAnA BAgagaLalilx dharisuva nAnA ratanx, loVha, shile, maNuNx modalAdavugaLiMda nimARNavAda liMga caraliMga, vishavxsatxru matutx shiSayxrugaLige gurushariVraveV guruliMga:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BUvikArANi liMgAni jAcnxtAni parxbarxviVmi vaH |\\
savxyaMBuliMgaM parxthamaM biMduliMgaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\
parxtiSiThxtaM caraM ceYva guruliMgaM ca paMcamamf |\\
savxyaMBUtaM jAtamiti savxyaMBUriti taM viduH ||\\
biMdunAdamayaM liMgaM sAthxvaraM jaMgamaM ca yatf ||\\
mahadiBxshecxYva shAsatxrXjecnxYH rAjaBishacx mahAdhaneYH |\\
shilepxVna kalipxtaM liMgaM maMterxVNa sAthxpitaM ca yatf ||\\
parxtiSiThxtaM pArxkaqtaM hi pArxkaqteYshavxyaRBoVgadamf |\\
kaTAyxdiSu tirxkoVNeVSu liMgamAdhAyxtimxkaM caramf ||\\
parxthamaM caraliMgeVSu rasaliMgaM parxkathayxteV |\\
shilAliMgaM bArxhamxNAnAM savaRkAmaPalaparxdamf ||\\
ratanxliMgaM kaSxtirxyANAM mahArAjayxparxdaM shuBamf |\\
savxNaRliMgaM tu veYshAyxnAM mahAdhanavatA parxdamf ||\\
maqlilxMgaM ca tu shUdArxNAM mahadeYshavxyaRdaM viduH |\\
sAPxTikaM bANaliMgaM ca saveRVSAM savaRkAmadamf ||\\
vishavxsAthxnAM tu shiSAyxNAM gururitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tasAmxdugxrushariVraM tu guruliMgaM BaveVdf budhAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, 3. 346-401)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdu, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMgaveMdu, BAvaliMgavu parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgaveMdu-oTuTx Aru vidha. ivu\-gaLu SaTfsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive. AcAraliMgavu Bakatxsathxla, guru\-liMgavu mAheVshavxrasathxla, shivaliMgavu parxsAdisathxla, caraliMgavu pArxNa\-liMgisathxla, parxsAdaliMgavu sharaNasathxla matutx mahAliMgavu aikayxsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AcAraliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM BakatxsathxlaM mahatf |\\
guruliMgasamAyukatxmaMgaM mAheVshavxrasathxlamf ||\\
shivaliMgasamAyukatxM parxsAdisathxlamAgatamf |\\
aMgaM ca caraliMgeVna saMyukatxM pArxNaliMgi yatf ||\\
parxsAdaliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM hi sharaNasathxlamf |\\
mahAliMgasamAyukatxmaMgameYkayxsathxlaM paramf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 72-82)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAraliMga modalAda Aru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA mUru mUru vidhavAgutatxve. AcAraliMgavu sadAcAraliMga, niyatAcAraliMga, gaNAcAraliMga; guruliMgavu diVkASxguruliMga, shikASxguruliMga, anuBAvaguruliMga; shivaliMgavu iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga; caraliMgavu savxyaliMga, caraliMga, paraliMga; parxsAdaliMgavu shudadhxparxsAdaliMga, sidadhxparxsAdaliMga, parxsidadhxparxsAdaliMga; mahAliMgavu piMDajaliMga, aMDajaliMga, biMdAvxkAshaliMgaveMdu oTuTx hadineMTu liMgagaLAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlamAcAraliMgasayx tirxvidhaM shUrxyatAM karxmAtf |\\
sadAcArasutx niyaatoV gaNAcArasatxthAparaH ||\\
diVkASx shikASxnuBAvashacx guruliMgaM tirxdhA BaveVtf |\\
shivaliMgasavxrUpaM teV vakASxyXmi shaqNu pAvaRti ||\\
iSaTxliMgaM pArxNaliMgaM BAvaliMgamiti tirxdhA ||\\
caraliMgasathxlasAyxsayx savxrUpaM kathayAmi teV |\\
savxyaM caraM paraM ceVti terxYvidhayxM samupAgatamf ||\\
parxsAdaliMgaterxYvidhayxmapi shaqNu varAnaneV |\\
shudadhxM sidadhxM parxsidadhxM ca BeVdashecxYSAmathoVcayxteV ||\\
mahAliMgasathxlaM cApi tirxdhA BinanxM shaqNu karxmAtf |\\
piMDajaM parxthamaM porxVkatxmaMDajaM ca tataH paramf ||\\
biMdAvxkAshaM tatoV jecnxVyameVSAM lakaSxNamucayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8-26)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sithxra, cara, sithxracara, carasithxra, sithxrasithxra, caracara eMdu liMgavu Aru vidha (lakaSxNagaLanunx Adharisida BeVda):}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sithxraM caraM sithxracaraM carasithxramathAMbikeV |\\
sithxrasithxraM caracaraM SaDivxdhaM liMgalakaSxNamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 16. 9)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{AyA pada\-gaLu}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu liMgavu mUru vidha. ivu talA matetx mUru mUru vidhavAgi oTuTx oMbatutx vidhavAgutatxve. ELu-eMTu-oMbatutx aMgulagaLa liMgavu utatxma; nAlukx-aidu-Aru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{madhayxma}; oMdu-eraDu-mUru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{adhama} enisutatxve. niVrina meVlina guLeLxya AkAradudx utatxma\-liMga; koVLimoTeTxya AkAradudx madhayxma; hasuvina hega\-lina AkAradudx madhayxmaliMga (AkArada AdhAradiMda uMTAda BeVda). oMdu, eraDu, mUru, nAlukx, aidu, Aru, ELu, eMTu, oMbatutx aMgula gAtarxda oMbatutx liMga\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmaM madhayxmaM niVcamiti liMgaM tirxdhoVcayxteV |\\
ESevxVkeVna tirxdhA tadavxdukatxmaMgulamAnataH ||\\
navASaTxsapAtxMgulakaM liMgaM sherxVSaThxM tathA samxqqtamf |\\
SaTfpaMcakacatumARnaM madhayxmaM tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
tirxdevxyXVkAMgulamAniVyaM tirxvidhaM tasayx saMsakxqqtamf |\\
EvaM navavidhaM porxVkatxM yathA karxmAtf ||\\
utatxmaM budubxdAkAraM madhayxmaM kukukxTAMDavatf |\\
adhamaM goVkakutfparxKayxmiti liMgaM tirxdhA samxqqtamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 4. 52-55)}
\newmeaning{\artha{aKaMDaliMga, BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga, paqthivxVrUpada AcAraliMga, jalarUpada guruliMga, teVjoVrUpada shivaliMga, vAyurUpada caraliMga, AkAshamayavAda parxsAdaliMga, AtamxtatatxvXrUpada mahAliMga-eMdu hatutx vidha liMga\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxliMgaparxkaqtikaM AcAraguruliMgakeV |\\
pAthiRvApeyxV iti porxVketxV sheYvAgamavishAradeYH ||\\
pArxNaliMgaparxkaqtikeV teVjoVvAyumayeV tathA |\\
shivaliMgacarABiKeyxV liMgeV devxV varavaNiRni ||\\
voyxVmaparxkaqtikaM liMgaM pArxsAdAKayxM mahatatxramf |\\
AtamxtatatxvXmayaM porxVkatxM mahAliMgaM mahatatxramf ||\\
iti sidAdhxMtasheVKaravacaneVnoVkAtxnAM dashavidhaliMgAnAmf...
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga eMdu liMgasathxlavu mUru vidha. I mUru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA eraDeraDAgutatxve. BAvaliMgavu mahAliMga, parxsAdaliMga eMdU, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga eMdU, iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdU talA eraDeraDAgi oTuTx Aru liMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM tadeBxVdoV vaNayxRteV karxmAtf ||\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdf divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVtatf tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
EkameVkaM sathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\
tathA ca caraliMgaM ca shivaliMgamiti davxyamf |\\
pArxNaliMgaM BavateyxVva tAtapxyARthoRV na saMshayaH ||\\
guruliMgaM tathA{\char'263\char'263}cAraliMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
iSaTxliMgaM BavateyxVva satayxmukatxmidaM mayA ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxliMgaM ca caraliMgakamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 3. 16-21)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgAMgasAmarasayxdalilx aneVka parxBeVdagaLive. muKayxvAgi sAdhanasahita matutx sAdhanarahita eMdu eraDu vidha. veVdhA, manu (maMtarx), kirxyA eMba mUru diVkeSxgaLiMda uMTAguva sAdhanegaLiMda sAdhisuvaMtahadudx sAdhanasahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx. shirxVguruvina upadeVshavanunx pAlisuvudariMda uMTAguvudu sAdhanarahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx enisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgasAmarasayxsayx parxkArAH bahavoV mayA ||\\
daharoVpAsanAdhAyxyeV saMvagoRVpAsanAdayaH |\\
sahitAH sAdhaneVneYteV rahitAH sAdhaneYsatxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 9-10)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAMgayoVH sAmarasayxM jiVvabarxhemxYkayxlakaSxNamf ||\\
tadapi divxvidhaM porxVkatxM sAdhaneVna samanivxtamf |\\
divxtiVyaM tadivxnimuRkatxmAdayxM gurukaqtaM parA ||\\
divxtiVyamapi shiSayxsayx guruvAkayxsayx pAlanAtf |\\
AdayxM veVdhAdidiVkASxBayxsitxrXpuMDarxsAyxpi dhAraNAtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nitayxliMgAcaRne, kAmayxliMgAcaRne eMdu liMgAcaRneyu eraDu vidha. iSATxthaRvanunx pUreYsuvudu kAmayxliMgAcaRne, pApanAshakavAdadudx nitayxliMgAcaRne:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgAcaRnaM tu divxvidhaM nitayxkAmayxviBeVdataH |\\
tatheYva haradatAtxyeRYrukatxM tAtapxyaRsaMgarxheV ||\\
devxVdhA tavAcaRnavidhisatxruNeVMdumwleV |\\
kAmAya kashicxdaparoV duritakaSxyAya |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(paM. ca., 1. 5-6)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgapUjeyu mahatiV, guviRV, laGivxV, avasarA eMdu nAlukx vidha. mahatiV pUjeyanunx utatxmanu (SaTfkAlagaLalilx pUjemADuvavanu), guviRVpUjeyanunx madhayxmanu (tirxkAla pUjemADuvavanu), ashakatxnu pArxtaHkAla \hbox{muMtAda} samayadalilx BoVjana samayadalilx avasarA pUje\-yanunx mADabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmoV mahatiVM kuyARdf guviRVM madhayxma Eva ca |\\
laGivxVmashakatxH kuyARcacx sAyaM mAdhAyxhanxkeV tathA ||\\
avasarA BoVjaneV porxVkAtx pArxtarAdiSu suvarxteV |\\
tirxkAlamacaRnAM kuyARcaCxkatxH SaTfkAlameVva vA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-6; makuTa., kirx. pA., 3. 3-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{mahatiVpUjA, guviRVpUjA, laGivxVpUjA, avasarApUjA}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMdu parxdhAnavAgi aidu BeVda. raMBa eMbudu Araneyadu. ivu karxmavAgi AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, caraliMga, parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgada rUpa\-gaLu. nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVva\-datatx, dhanaMjaya, satxMBa eMdu Aru upavAyu\-gaLu. I upavAyu\-gaLu karxmavAgi Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa, aikayx eMba SaTfsathxlarUpa\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vAyavaH-pArxNaH apAnaH vAyxnaH udAnaH samAnaH raMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMgarUpAH |...\\
upavAyavaH-nAgaH kUmaRH kaqkaraH deVvadatatxH dhanaMjayaH satxMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH BakatxmAheVshavxraparxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNeYkayxrUpAH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shurx. sA., 16, pu. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAmAnayx, visheVSa, nirABAriV eMdu viVrasheYvavu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
punaH tirxvidhameVtadidhx sAmAnAyxdiparxBeVdataH |\\
sAmAnayxshacx visheVSashacx nirABAriVti ca tirxdhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 35; sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 30)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva, visheVSa viVrasheYva, nirABAriV viVrasheYva}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shwrxtaviVrasheYva, savxtaMtarxviVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha. vaNARsharxma dhamaRda AcaraNeyiMda saMpananxvAdudu shwrxta\-viVrasheYva. vaNARsharxmadhamaRda AcaraNeyilalxdudx savxtaMtarx viVrasheYva:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVrasheYvaM parxvakASxyXmi viditaM shurxtitaMtarxyoVH |\\
shwrxtaM savxtaMtarxmiti ca divxvidhaM parikiVtiRtamf ||\\
vaNARsharxmiVyadhamARDhayxM shwrxtamitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tadiVyadhamaRrahitaM savxtaMtarxmiti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 30-31)}
\newmeaning{\artha{pUvaRshAMBaviV, utatxrashAMBaviV eMdu I muderxyu eraDu vidha. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTxyiMdalU, nAdAnu saMdhAna\-vanunx mADuva manasisxnoMdige kUDuva muderx pUvaR\-shAMBaviV eMdenisutatxde. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTx matutx manasusx nAdabarxhamxdalilx muLugidare utatxrashAMBaviV muderx eMdenisutatxde:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shAMBaviV divxvidhA porxVkAtx pUvoRVtatxraviBeVdataH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., pu. 146)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
nAsAgarxdatatxnimiSoVnimxSabAhayxdaqSATxyX\\
lakeSxyXV sadAshivavimashaRkagUDhadaqSATxyX |\\
joyxVtiH savxrUpamacalaM haqdi bAhayxhiVnaM\\
pashayxMti yeV ta iha saMyaminaH kaqtAthARH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 5. 7)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shivajAcnxna, shivaBakitx, shivadhAyxna, shivavarxta, shivapUje eMdu shivayoVgavu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
jAcnxnaM shivamayaM BakitxH sheYviV dhAyxnaM shivAtamxkamf |\\
sheYvavarxtaM shivAceRVti shivayoVgoV hi paMcadhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 15)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{yoVga}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{vaMshayxshiSayx, AgaMtukashiSayx eMdu eraDu vidha. vaMshayxshiSayxnu matetx muKayx matutx sAmAnayx eMdu eraDu vidha. muKayx shiSayxnu barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx eMdu eraDu vidha. barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri carapati, nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha. beVre vaMshadalilx janisida shiSayxnu AgaMtuka shiSayx eMdenisutAtxne:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\
muKayxH sAmAnayxH iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceVti divxdhA muKoyxV viBidayxteV |\\
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH yaH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip

\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 4. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{I diVkeSxyu sabiVja, abiVja (nibiRVja), cinamxya eMdu mUru vidha. I mUru BeVda\-gaLu karxmavAgi kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDagaLalilx sapxSaTxvAgive:}}

I nAlukx bageya baMdhanagaLige mAyeyeV kAraNa. shudAdhxdhavxrige (shudadhxmAgaRdavarige) beYMdavapAshavuMTAdare, mishArxdhavxdavarige (misharxmAgaRdavarige) kAmiRka matutx ANavapAshagaLive. mAyiVya malavu ashudAdhxdhavxvatiRgaLige (ashudadhxmAgaRdavarige) aMTikoLuLxtatxde. beYMdava matutx mAyiVyapAsha\-gaLu AgaMtuka\-gaLu (naDuve baruvaMtahavu). ANavamalavu anAdi. adu maheVshavxrAnugarxhadiMda, sheYva\-diVkeSx\-yiMda kamARMtadalilx mAtarx nAshavAguvaMtahadudx. kAmaR\-malavu cidfjAcnxnayoVga saMnAyxsadiMda nAshavAguvaMtahadudx:}}

\begin{shl}

\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 9. 3. 93-106)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{parabarxhamxsavxrUpi shivatatatxvXdoDane bereta mAyAshakitxya koSxVBeyiMda sathxlavu aMgasathxla matutx liMgasathxla eMdu eraDu vidhavAgutatxde. adaraMte mAheVshavxrasathxlavU eraDu vidhavAgi mAheVshavxraparxshaMsAsathxla, liMganiSAThxsathxla, pUvARsharxya\-nirasanasathxla, savARdevxYtanirasanasathxla, AhAvxnanirasanasathxla, aSaTxmUtiRnirasanasathxla, savaRgatavxnirasanasathxla, shivajaganamxyasathxla, BakatxdeVhikaliMgasathxla eMba oMbatutx aMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve. aMteyeV kirxyAgamasathxla, BAvAgamasathxla, jAcnxnAgamasathxla, sakAyasathxla, akAyasathxla, parakAyasathxla, dhamARcArasathxla, BAvAcArasathxla, jAcnxnAcArasathxlaveMdu liMgasathxladalilx \hbox{oMbatutx} avAMtarasathxlagaLAgutatxve:}}

\medskip

\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxragaLalilx yakAravu BUmi, vAkAravu niVru, shikAravu beMki, makAravu vAyu, nakAravu AkAragaLige biVjagaLAgive. OMkAravu elalx tatatxvXgaLa biVjavAgide:}}

\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu IshAdi deVvategaLa parxtiVkavAgive. yakArakekx Isha, vAkArakekx maheVsha, shikArakekx shiva, makArakekx videyx, nakArakekx AtAmx matutx OMkArakekx parashiva ivaru\-gaLu deVvate\-gaLu:}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I mahAliMga tAnobabxneV, aMdare keVvala icACxmAtarx\-diMdaleV saqSiTxsalAra. hAge mADalu avanige shakitx beVku. shakitxyU saha A sithxtiyalilx nAmarUpagaLilalxda avayxkatxsithxtiyalilxdudx, mahAliMgana oMdu aviBAjayx aMgavAgide. parashivana A avasethxge mahAliMga eMba hesaru heVge anavxyavAguvaMte shakitxya Agina avasethxge cicaCxkitx eMba hesaru anavxyavAgutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shUnayxsithxtiyiMda utapxtitxyAda AdiliMga; saqSiTx sithxti layagaLige kAraNavAda mUlashivatatatxvX; shUnayxdiMda parxkaTagoMDa mUlacitutx savaRvAyxpiyAdudu. anaMtara udayi\-sida nAda, biMdu, kale\-gaLu mUlacitutxvinoMdige beretAga OMkAra\-parxNava athavA mahAliMga utapxtitxyAyitu. idu atayxMta teVjoVmayavU ceYtanayxsavxrUpavU goVLA\-kAravU Adudu. paMcasAdAKayx\-gaLu, paMcashakitx\-gaLu, paMca\-BUta\-gaLu, paMcakale\-gaLu muMtAduvanunx tananxlilx aDagisi\-koMDidudx saqSiTxya kAyaRgaLige kAraNavenisidudu I mahA\-liMga; savaRshUnayx sithxtiya vikAsadalilx shUnayxliMga niSakxlaliMga pada, mahAliMga eMba sithxtigaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{aKaMDAdavxya nitayxniravaya paripUNaR sacicxdAnaMdavapapx niSakxlaliMgavu tAnu niSakxlanAgi niravayadalilx bayaluganAgi irabAradeMdu dhAyxna pUjegaLilalxde irabAradeMdu, tananx savxicACxliVlA\-vilAsadoV{\ri} neneva nenahu mAtarxdalilxyeV tananx citapxrXBAsAmathayxR shakitxya muMdugoMDu aKaMDateVjoVmUtiRyapapx mahAliMgavAyitutx (liMgaliV. 11-5); paragUDhavA shariVrasathx liMgakeSxVtarx urutarAnAdiyiVshavxra teVja\-viMteYdu pariya saMjecnxyanuLuLxdA mahAliMgaveY (viVsheYpu. 1-8-14); parashivaM citatxde parxvaqtitxyaM neneyalaMdurutarada citetx cicaCxkitxyAyatxda{\ri}Mde varamahAliMgavAyutx (cebapu. 60-36).}
\artha{AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx mahAliMga eMba Aruvidhada liMgagaLalilx oMdu; I SaDivxdhaliMga\-gaLu anukarxmavAgi Bakatx, maheVsha, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa matutx aikayx eMba SaTasxthXlagaLoDane saMbaMdhisidudx, aikayxnalilx mahAliMgavu nelasutatxde. manuSayxna kirxyegaLige kAraNavAda citatx, budidhx, ahaMkAra, mana, \hbox{jAcnxna} matutx BAva eMbuvugaLige anukarxmavAgi SaDivxdhaliMga\-gaLu saMbaMdhapaDutatxve:}

\begin{entry}

\newmeaning{\artha{shaMkarara adevxYtadalilx `mAye' eMba padavanunx `Barxme'

 satayxvalalx. hagagxvu katatxleyalilx hAvinaMte
 kANu(toVru)tatxde. adeV riVti niguRNa barxhamxvu athavA anaMta
 citutx parimitavAda jaDa athavA Bwta jagatitxnaMte toVrutatxde. I
 toVrike (Barxme) abAdhitavalalx. beLaku baMda kUDaleV nAvu noVDidudu
hAvalalx, hagagx mAtarx eMba arivu heVge mUDutatxdeyoV hAgeyeV,
barxhamxjAcnxna \hbox{uMTAda} kUDaleV jagatitxnaMte kANutitxdudxdu niguRNa
citutx eMba arivu mUDutatxde. idelalx toVrikeyU ajAcnxna athavA
mAyeyiMda.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad Adare vacanakAraru parxpaMcavu BarxmeyalalxveMdU, vAsatxvika
 satayxveMdU heVLutAtxre. adu parashivana shakitxyiMdAda
 utapxnanx. shivashakitxge mAye eMba payARya pada\-vanUnx vacanakAraru
 baLasutAtxre. AdudariMda jagatfsaqSiTxge mAyeyu upAdAnakAraNa.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad mAyeyu ``adhoVmAye'' matutx ``UdhavxRmAye'' eMdu eraDu
 bageyAgide. I eraDu pada\-gaLu ``kalAshakitx'' matutx
 ``Bakitxshakitx'' eMba padagaLige payARya padagaLAgive (noVDi : {\bf
 shakitx}).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{matotxMdathaRdalilx yAvudu sakalaranUnx kADutatxdeyoV adeV
 mAye:} \ullekha{``muMdugeDisitutx mAye'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 14-71) ``idAva pariyalilx kADitu
 mAye'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 15-7)} \arthanonum{eMbalilx I athaR sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. mAye \hbox{iMdArxdi}
 deVvategaLanunx kADutatxde muMtAda vAkayx\-gaLu `mAye' eMdare kaSaTx
 athavA keVDu mADuva shakitx eMdAgutatxde. hari haMdiyAdudu,
 barxhamxnige shira hoVdudu, deVveVMdarxnu shApagarxsatxnAgi
 roVgiyAdudu, itAyxdigaLelalx parashivana mAyeyiMdAgiye. Adare mAye
 obabx heMgasu eMdu tiLiyuvudu tapupx. vacanakAraru mAyeyanunx
 mAyAMgane, muMtAgi sitxrXVvAcaka padagaLiMda karedidadxrU, mAye
 heMgasalalx. vacanasAhitayxdalilx kirxyAshakitx, icACxshakitx,
 itAyxdi shakitxgaLa paTiTxyalAlxgali, sadAshiva, Ishavxra, itAyxdi
 sAdAKayx (adhideVvate)gaLa paTiTxyalAlxgali mAye eMba vayxkitxyu
 seVpaRDeyAgilalx.}
\artha{``Ase'' eMbudu ``mAye''ya matotxMdu athaR. ``manada muMdaNa
 AseyeV mAye'' eMbalilx idu sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. pArxyashaH
 `aniyaMtirxta Ase' eMbudu adara oLAthaRvirabahudu.}
\artha{marevu athavA ajAcnxna (avideyx) eMbudu matotxMdu athaR. nAvu
 namamx nijavAda savxrUpada bagegx athavA jiVvanada nijavAda
 dheyxVyada bagegx jAcnxnavilalxdidadxre, nAvu
 mAyegoLagAgidedxVveMdathaR (noVDi: mAyAkAvaLa, mAyACAye):}
\ullekha{sidadhxrAmanu ivelalxvanUnx tAtapxyaRrUpadalilx ``yoVgige
 koVpaveV mAye, roVgige apathayxveV mAye, jAcnxnige mithayxveV mAye;
 arideneMbuvaMge nAnu niVneMbude mAye'' (savaaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 957-268); aMdhamoVha; meYmarevu; visamxqqti: aDaviya hogisitutx huDukuniVraladidxtutx ...I beDagina mAyeya baDihAri(?) samayigaLa nuDige nAcuvenu (savasaM. 6; aMbiga. 26-10); beVDa beVDa BoVgadoDanATa ...keVDu kaDeyoLihudadu mAyeya \hbox{keYyATa} (keYvapa. 50-1 palalxvi).}
\artha{mAyApaMcakagaLalilx oMdu; Barxme; BArxMti:}
\ullekha{jagadUrxpa\-mAda anayxthAtoVkeRge kAraNamapupxda{\ri}M mAyeyenisuvudu (viveVka. 30).}
\artha{sakala jiVvarAshigaLanunx hurupugoLisuva paMcashakitxgaLalilx oMdAda parAshakitxyalilxruva biMdu, kuMDalini matutx mAye eMba mUru parxkAragaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{hiraNayxgaBaRdiMdaM ...paMcashakitxgaLogedavu AyA sushakitx\-gaLu savaRjiVvaperxVrakAyatatxvAgihavu pUvoRVkatx pareye mU\char'273\char'304\char'301yadhika biMdu kuMDalini mAyegaLenutatx (viVsheYpu. 7-98-22).}
\artha{tirxvidha tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdAda pAshada aidu viBAgagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{A pAshaveV mala mAye kamaR biMdu tiroVdhAnaveMdu paMcavidhavahudu (viveVka. 138).}
\artha{pati, kuMDalini, mAye, pashu, pAsha matutx diVkeSxyeMba SaTapxdAthaRgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{I sakalAgamaMgaLalilxyU ...pati kuMDalini mAye pashu pAsha diVkeSxyeMba SaTapxdAthaRM\-gaLu ...parxtipAdayxMgaLakukxM (viveVka. 67).}
\artha{pAvaRtiya tAmasakeya oMdu rUpa.}}
